properties.name: The Man
properties.description:
2015 Art Theme: CARNIVAL OF MIRRORS
From the looking glass to the selfie, people seek answers to the riddle of identity in their own reflections. Yet even the most perfect mirror shows only the persona, not the person. This year a funhouse at the center of our carnival will contemplate the puzzle of self-consciousness. Many kinds of masks and mirrors will line the corridors and chambers of this interactive maze. Here people will confront a shuffled deck of selves: the me they want to be (but aren’t), the me they repudiate (but are), the me they can’t imagine (but might be).

At the heart of this disorienting maze, a final passage will reveal a courtyard that surrounds the Burning Man. Photo booths will here record the faces of participants, merging them into a swirling stream that will envelop the entire body of the Man. The brittle mirror and the occulting mask will melt away, and at this point there’ll be no gag, no swag, no souvenir of self; the show will be you.

properties.name: Temple of Promise
properties.description:
The Temple of Promise is a guide. It’s a calming hand, and it’s a listening ear. Nestled in its center is a grove of trees. It’s no tower or pyramid or other such shape dictated by logic alone. It is no less a temple for its lifelike forms. It is more.

Scattered amidst the flow of the Temple area, wooden sculptures shaped like stones form a soft boundary. The tapering spiral of the main structure provides shelter and quiet. The lobed spire at its opening will tower 97 feet high. The tail of the building curls into a circle around the open-air grove, a container well suited for gatherings. The trees will be bare at the beginning of the week, but participants will leave their messages on strips of white cloth, which they will hang from the trees like the leaves of a weeping willow.                                                     http://www.templeofpromise.org/

properties.name: Blunderwood Portable
properties.description:
The Blunderwood Portable. Better known as "the giant typewriter," the project is a 24:1 scale of a 1920s Underwood Portable typewriter. Each day, the typewriter will display a section of a poem on a fabric ""paper."" Each night, we will convert the paper to a projection screen and participants will be able to type by walking on the typewriter keys and projecting their keystrokes onto the screen.

The project was inspired by the nearly 100-year-old works of Don Marquis, a newspaperman who published a column titled Archy and Mehitabel. Archy was a free verse poet reincarnated as a typing cockroach, and Mehitabel was the alley cat who provided him with material to write about.

EVENTS: Tuesday, 1:30-5:30. Ice Cream Social with the Reverse Cowboy Creamery. Beats and Ice cream at the typewriter!

Wed, 9pm-? The Space Bar at the typewriter. A champagne only bar at the typewriter, with a viewing of the 1960's movie ""Shinbone Alley"" projected on the paper. The movie is based on the story of Archy and Mehitabel.

http://www.blunderwood.com

properties.name: Star Tetrahedron
properties.description:
(located at 11:50 & 3300 ft)

This is a life size star tetrahedron
The main idea of this piece is to give the participant a new and useful vehicle to observe an aspect of their light-body which is rarely considered in everyday life. The piece must be interacted with in order to fully express it’s purpose.

As each individual engages the piece, they will have a unique experience, coloured by their own personal perspective of life, and interfacing with the inherent geometry of the Star-tetrahedron. (The fact that a large number of people will be able to experience standing within a physical representation of their own light-body may even be said to aid in our collective evolution

properties.name: Hare Today, Gone Tomorrow
properties.description:
(locate at 5:55 & 1300 ft)    Silicon Valley has long been heralded as the epicenter of technological innovation. They are the creators of the Internet, the keepers of the Google search, the denizens of Twitter. And because of them, no longer do questions go unanswered. Whenever someone wants to know who that guy was in that movie, or how that magic trick was really done, the answer is a few keystrokes away. That air of mystery has vanished from the world, replaced with the oversaturation of easily accessible information.

The South Bay Burners seek to restore that magic and mystery with Hare Today, Gone Tomorrow. A top hat, long forgotten by the desert, provides refuge for those clever enough to unlock its secrets.                                                                                                                                                               Happy Hour in the Hat Wednesday afternoon (see booklet for details)
Burns Thursday at 10pm!

properties.name: Storied Haven
properties.description: (located 11:30 & 1900 ft)                                           by Bree Hylkema and Five Ton Crane.                     She is the keeper of stories, holder of memories, steward of dreams. In a fairytale world where animals talk and children shouldn’t wander the woods at night, an enchanted home inside of a grand boot lures us. It beckons to wayward passersby with a promise of fantastical delight and dark mystery.                                           http://storiedhaven.com/

properties.name: BRC3PO
properties.description:
Address: 3:00 Portal @ Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock City Post Office The Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services and so much more. Set in a giant rural post box open up to 24 hours per day BRC3PO is a destination camp for real one-on-one interaction that can range from the supremely silly to the sublime. Our "customers" often become performers in an ongoing spontaneous cabaret. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO. YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO if you pay us a visit! Our excuse for interaction is postcards which you can send to your friends in BRC or anywhere in the world. You come with your imagination and your willingness to play. We provide the postcards.
Contact: https://www.facebook.com/BRC3PO

properties.name: Art Car Camp
properties.description:
Address: 2:00 & Rod's Road, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Art Car Camp at Burning Man was started in 1994 by art car creator, documentarian and promoter, Harrod Blank. As the Burning Man Festival has grown, art vehicles have become more elaborate and fantastical (now known as "Mutant Vehicles"). Many of the original "art cars" that once roamed the playa freely can no longer get licensed by the Black Rock DMV. Art Car Camp celebrates these street legal, permanently altered "daily drivers". Our camp also has a few Mutant Vehicles including one of the very first to ever drive the Playa, Pepper Mouser's Motorized Living Room!" Come and see the origin point of Art Cars at Black Rock City! | Our M-USED Car Lot will be on display 24 Hours along with our gallery tent which has some chill space while you check out images of Art Cars from around the U.S. and Canada.
Contact:

properties.name: Flirt Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 9:15 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 9:15 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Flirt Camp is a lush and sensual lounge space with music, benches, pillows, an alter and a bar. We have a nice backlit Flirt Camp sign on the front of our lounge space that brings folks in. Just park the bike in the provided bike rack and come on in!
Once at the bar, roll the Flirt Dice or have a spin of our Flirt Wheel to "break the ice" and enjoy a refreshing cocktail. Mingle in our well-shaded lounge with lots of sensual color and creature comforts.
The lounge area is open 24 hours a day. The bar area is open for most of the day while a camper is available.
During the week, we hold guided meditations and yoga at the camp, a couple really cool dance parties and a flash-mob in our front yard.
The foundation of our interaction with the Burning Man community is a commitment to having amazing relationships and keeping the chemistry alive and hot.
Like us on Facebook and we'll like you back:
https://www.facebook.com/FlirtCampSF

xoxoxo
Events: Tuesday, 9/1, 2 pm - Flirting Workshop
Join us for an afternoon of interactive flirting at Burning Man!

Together we will practice being present and in our bodies, the art of turn on, touching with consent, taking flirting to the next level, and hot techniques like "the look".

Bring an open heart and open mind. We'll take care of the rest. ;-)
Link: https://www.facebook.com/FlirtCampSF





https://youtube.com/watch?v=SaEjrvrM_xQ

properties.name: CouchBurners Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 9:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 9:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Couch Burners, a cross section of CouchSurfers and BRC inhabitants, welcome weary, wild, and wondrous travelers alike to chat, relax, perform, interact, and play some international games and sports. Come learn tips and suggestions on successful international travel, converse in your original language, relax in our cafe & lounge, watch some bocci, croquet, horshoes, or giant pool, or gather a team for human fooseball, or fire dancing with a slew of likeminded individuals participating to create a better world… one couch at a time.
Events: Tuesday, Sep 1st, 2015, 6pm-11:45pm CS International Meat & Greet
Thursday, Sep 3rd, 2015, 2pm-5pm International Party and Language Exchange!
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1399254543713321/

properties.name: Camp Banana Hammock
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 9:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 9:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Come enjoy swingin' days and sultry nights, with Camp Banana Hammock! We've got intimate places to start your heart-races. Sway away in our Banana Hammocks — a shaded oasis with almost a dozen hammocks suspended over a pool of stuffed animals. Relax as sexy, ambient beats, envelope you.  Swing in the breeze; rejuvenate your mind, body and soul; then head back out to the playa ready for whatever comes next.
Events: Come Get your Banana Creamed! On Tuesday, Wednesday & Thursday at peak action time from 2:30 - 4:30pm, we will be gifting Frozen Bananas and toppings.
Link:

properties.name: Buddha Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Buddhacamp@theLotusDome was started in 2007 by a small group of Burner Buddhists in Seattle, Washington. The goal: bring Nichiren Diashonin’s Buddhism to Black Rock City to share with thousands of open minded seeking people, and provide a space for fellow practitioners to gather and chant together. Today, we are equal parts Buddhism and mayhem, and welcome all who want to laugh, play, and reveal their inner Buddha.
Events: 9:00 am – Laughing BuddhaYoga - Get yogatic and stretch your inner Buddha at the Lotus Dome. Greet the day with a full heart and a happy body.
10:00 am – Naked Espresso for the Buddhist Heart- You supply the cup, and we’ll supply the naked…espresso that is!
10:30 am – Ask a Buddhist - Judeo-Christian worldview put a dent in your Burn? Confused about reality, the purpose of your burn, or how you got that tattoo on your ass? Come ask a Buddhist!
11:30 am – Chanting in the Lotus DomeJoin us daily in the Lotus Dome for Gongyo (the recitation of the Lotus Sutra) and Daimoku (Chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo). Reveal your inner Buddha.
Anytime – Open Meditation SpaceThe Lotus Dome is always open to visitors looking for a safe, sober space for chanting, meditation, yoga, or just a moment of quiet reflection."
Link: https://buddhacamp.wordpress.com/

properties.name: Rhythm Wave
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Proud to return to Black Rock City for our 9th consecutive year, RhythmWave is dedicated to the practice of Conscious Dance as a moving meditation. With no experience necessary and no "steps" to learn, Conscious Dance provides a path - the destination is the discovery of ourselves and a return to our center.
RhythmWave offers multiple daily sessions of Conscious Dance and movement on our 2,000 sq. ft., fully shaded and easily-accessible bamboo dance floor. We also host morning yoga and meditation, as well as workshops and intention circles throughout the week.
Every Black Rock Citizen is invited to bless the bamboo at RhythmWave,  Arcade @ 4:45. Please join us!
Events: http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=rhythmwave
Link: http://www.rhythmwave.org/

properties.name: Camp Gold Star
properties.description:
Village: Home Rule Village
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: What is Camp Gold Star, you ask? Well, that's a fantastic question! And not just one of those 'There's no such thing as a stupid question' questions. No! You've stumbled upon a real winner; good job! Oh, you didn't ask? Well...
Buck up, Kiddo. The folks at Camp Gold Star know that somewhere deep inside that sparkle pony facade is a very special snowflake, and we've got what you need to feed your body and your ego. 
Stop by before the burn for your daily dose of overenthusiastic personal adulation, participation certificates, trophies, hugs, and all the snark you can handle. 
Stop by after the burn for tasty beverages, orange slices, and even more TLC. You may even be named “#1 All-Time Greatest, Most Amazing Person Ever!”
Use our Star Chart to track your Gold Star potential, you entitled little shit. 
Events:
Link: http://www.camp-gold-star.com

properties.name: School of Consensual Kink
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address: 3:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 3:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: All the classes you wish were available when you were in school -- Black Rock School of Consensual Kink (S.O.C.K.) offers a variety of classes and BDSM tastings by our faculty of trained kinksters. The kink curious of all genders, orientations, identities, and ages (18+) are welcome. See you in class!
Events: • Kinky Sex on the Playa - An Intro to BDSM (Mon / Wed 1:30pm - 3:30pm)  Our introduction to BDSM will cover a variety of BDSM (bondage, dominance/discipline, sadomasochism) topics and teach how to explore kink in a safe, consensual manner. This class will give you tools to explore kinky sex on playa (no toys required!) and resources for further exploration in the default world. Lecture & demos. 18+, ID req.
• BDSM Tastings (Mon/Tues/Thurs 4-6pm and Thurs. 11am - 1pm)  If you’re curious about BDSM, our experienced tops will be giving a variety of tastings. An event host will be available to answer any questions you may have. Come learn more about your own kinks and experience some new sensations. 18+, ID required.
• Kink Fu: Martial Arts for Sex (Tues 12:30pm - 1:30pm)  Dean Taser has converted 20 years of martial arts experience into sexy bedroom fun. Geared towards smaller people who want to take down larger people. Class will include lecture and demos.18+, ID req.
• Elements of BDSM Scene Design (Tues 2pm - 3:30pm)  So you’re kinky, but now what? How do you figure out what to do? In this class, we’ll explore ways to mix kink into your bedroom or into your life in creative ways. We’ll discuss how to stay inspired and keep things fresh. You’ll come away with tricks and tools for designing BDSM scenes that will keep you and your partner(s) connected, entertained, and aroused, time and time again. Lecture & Demos. 18+, ID required.
• Dominance & submission (Fri 11am - 12:30pm)  Have you fantasized about submitting to your partner or possibly taking charge in the bedroom? Or perhaps you’ve tried it and want to learn more. We’ll cover both sides of a variety of power-exchange relationships through demos and discussion. 18+, ID req.
• Ask the Kinkster (Fri 1pm - 2pm)  Come listen as our panel of BDSM bottoms share their experiences and answer questions. Arrive early to submit a question. Relevant to bottoms and tops of all genders/orientations. 18+, ID req.
• Exploring Kink Through Demos (Fri 2:30pm - 4pm)  Listen to our emcee’s narration as you watch our experienced kinksters present 6 short scenes, including bondage, flogging, D/s, and spanking. Q&A session will follow. 18+, ID required.
Link: http://www.blackrocksock.com

properties.name: Club Neu Verboten
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Offering our retro avant garde dance parties and more. Shade and comfortable couches for the weary Esplanade traveler.
Events: Last Beatnik Coffee Shop Free coffee,free period beats at Club Neu Verboten. You bring the bad poetry and bongos. • Monday, August 31st, 2015 10 a.m. – noonLate Night Reggae With RastahMahn Hail ! Reggae Foundation / Modern & UK Dub Style All tribes welcome. A night not be missed at Club Neu Verboten. 11:30-2 PM • Monday, August 31st, 2015 11:30 p.m. – 2 a.m.The Psychedelic Sound Revisited Join us at Club Neu Verboten as we follow Jimi and Jerry through the Door(s).We provide the ambiance. You provide the mood • Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.Pink Floyd-Pretty Playa Lights Come and take advantage of Club Neu Verbotens hospitality and Playa view for a Pink Floyd Pillow Party All new Mobile Fidelity mix. • Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 11 p.m. – 1:30 a.m.• “Wednesday Morning Funky Coffee Time” Get in the groove with a morning brew. Get down and dirty - soulful funk 10am – 12pm • Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 10 a.m. – noonOzak! Beatboxer I am a beatboxer with an electronic sound..Enjoy the spectrum and power of voice. Dance in a way that is not done on speakers, loops,or computers! • Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 6 p.m. – 7 p.m.""80's Dance Party - Decade of Decadence Nothing but pure dance at Club Neu Verbotens first 80's party since 2003. Special kool-aid will be served • Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.This Beat Is Technotronic A 90's Dance When pop met techno.From Snap to Daft Punk. From KLF to Madonna. Two hours of dance club classics at Club Neu Verboten • Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 10:30 p.m. – 12:30 a.m.Gummi Bear Sings!- Join songstress Gummi Bear at Club Neu Verboten for some great covers and original songs. Taking requests and welcomes other voices and instruments to join in. • Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 7 p.m. – 8:30 p.m.Beatles Night... The Finale A great 5 year run of the best party we have ever had is coming to an end. Be at Club Neu Verboten to share the energy and love as we present 3 hours of the Fab Four. • Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 10 p.m. – 1 a.m.DeadMau5 Night IV No DeadMau5 will not pull a Daft Punk and be at Club Neu Verboten. It's DJ Edge with an all new mix. Free glow mouse ears to the first 70 party goers • Friday, September 4th, 2015 9:30 p.m. – 11 p.m.AC/DC Power Hour What else needs to be said? 90 minutes of classic riffs for an early evening rave up. Fosters Beer by special compliments of DJ Edge and Club Neu Verboten • Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 8:30 p.m. – 10 p.m. UK Barbarella-Dome! A psychedelic space trip through 60s psych, freakbeat and exotica in a tin foil wonderland culminating in a glittery cosmic disco rave-up! Drinking games, face painting! • Friday, September 4th, 2015 11:45 p.m. – 2 a.m.Trent Reznor/Nine Inch Nails/How To Destroy Angels Man burns when he burns, and if he burns early or late, the NIN show will happen 30 minutes after he hits the ground at Club Neu Verboten. • Saturday, September 5th, 2015 11:15 p.m. – 1

properties.name: HoMojitoVille
properties.description:
Village: Gaylactic Invaders Village
Sector: 9
Address: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: A mirage appears in deep Playa. The aroma of fresh icy Homojitos stimulates your hypothalamus. Giant bright puffy flowers belt out groovy dance beats. Leave it to serendipity and the boys of Homojitoville! Always on the move, the Mobile Homojito Dance Bar and Sound Garden of Eden appears randomly, erupting in a fabulous cocktail and dance party, then disappears. Never in the same place twice, this is no mirage. Shake your groove thing where spontaneity rules! Bring us your cup, we’ll fill it with love. Just when you thought it couldn't get any gayer . . . Homojitoville!
Events: Tuesday 5pm- 8pm Happy Hour Cocktail and Dance Party  |   Wednesday 11am -noon - Art of Perspective Drawing Class  |  Wednesday 3pm -ish - Naked Pub Crawl Stop - Booze, Cruise, Groove.  |  Tuesday/Friday 3pm-4pm - Food Coma Yoga  |  Daily; Cinematic Automatic-Recall Wall; Slut Your Stuff Catwalk Runway; Homojitos and Genie Bottle Lounge                                                               Randomly roaming the Playa serving Homojitos from our Mobile Homojito Dance Bar and Sound Garden of Eden - Serving the parched BR Citizens icy fresh Homojitos and fabulous dance music with words!
Link: https://www.facebook.com/pages/HomojitoVille/146746548673607

Description: Come be reborn into the world of the Playa! Confess your sins, then spin the Wheel of Penance - which will tell you what you need to do (you may choose a G, R or NC-17 rated penance). Once completed, you'll be cleansed of your sins and can be reborn. You'll then rid yourself of all your worldly belongings (take your clothes off) and crawl through the 6' vagina, where someone will spank you and give you a rebirth certificate (laminated). 
Events: Daily 11-5

properties.name: Tropical Treehouse
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of Aloha! Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.
Events: Sarongs & Mai Tais Monday 12:00 AM - 1:00 AM (that's Sunday night into Saturday morning, not Monday night!) Early Burner Special! Join us to celebrate the Gate at the Tropical Treehouse. Paddle up to the tiki torches Sunday night for a sarong, a hug, and a mai tai. Just park it, people, you can always unpack tomorrow! Aloha! 
Lemon Bundt Cake and Iced Coffee Sober Social Saturday 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM   Mm hm. You know who you are. 11AM on hot Saturday and all you can think about is some sweet lemon bundt cake and your jones for a chemical-free iced coffee, with some clear-headed, yet surprisingly spaced-out, sober people. Not an AA meeting, but more like the after party. Swing by the Tropical Treehouse for the fellowship of Aloha! 
Nooner Coladas Thursday 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Yawn. It's noon, and while it's been warm and bright out for a while, you're still waking up, like on a lazy tropical vacation. Keep the illusion alive - stop by the Tropical Treehouse to enjoy pina coladas. Falling in love optional.

properties.name: Paradise Motel
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:40 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:40 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Paradise Motel is a Burning Man theme camp established in 2008 with members hailing from our Default World locales of San Francisco and LA. It is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool". This year's attraction: Fall off the path and into Paradise Motel’s Gypsy Tent. Lush softness and draped lavish fabrics entice you to take a break from the sun and have your spiritual pathway mapped out through the ancient art of Tarot. Get your tarot read, lounge in the opium den, or just watch the world swim by.
Events: Monday - Sunday: Snow Cones 12-4 Monday - Friday: Vinyasa Yoga 2015 8:15 -9:15am. Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 5 -7pm.: Gypsy Mirrorball Sunset Dance Party
Link: http://desertparadise.org
properties.Description: Paradise Motel is a Burning Man theme camp established in 2008 with members hailing from our Default World locales of San Francisco and LA. It is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool". This year's attraction: Fall off the path and into Paradise Motel’s Gypsy Tent. Lush softness and draped lavish fabrics entice you to take a break from the sun and have your spiritual pathway mapped out through the ancient art of Tarot. Get your tarot read, lounge in the opium den, or just watch the world swim by.
properties.Events: Monday - Sunday: Snow Cones 12-4 Monday - Friday: Vinyasa Yoga 2015 8:15 -9:15am. Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 5 -7pm.: Gypsy Mirrorball Sunset Dance Party

properties.name: Giraffes Come Home
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Giraffes Come Home is a new camp formed by a band of friends who converged over the last two years. The edges between our camp members came from a variety of experiences - whether we were close childhood friends, neighbors from previous burns, collaborators on fashion shows and build projects. The unique thing that we found amongst Giraffes was a sense of comfort, an open environment for unconstrained self expression, a melting pot of passionate personalities, and beneath it all, an underlying thread of mutual care and compassion.
In a sense, our group came together to form a sense of belonging and home, despite many of us being far from our homes of origin. It is this feeling that we want to bring out to share with our wider family on the playa.
Our camp members are a mix of veteran burners who have helped build previous camps, and also a group of virgins to welcome into the fold. Since Giraffes will be a fresh camp, we are enthusiastic about interactivity with the playa via two main structures that we will build: a Japanese tea house, and a climbable rope gym.
Events:
Link:

properties.name: GLAMCOCKS
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: With love and respect on the Playa and beyond, we are a group of gay friends who invite YOU with open arms into our sexy, loving family through coversation, drinks, and dance for ALL who stumble upon us. See who we are as individuals, know us as the GlamCocks!
Events: KALEIDOSCOPE KINGDOM'S ROYAL BALLTuesday, 9PM-Midnight The Kaleidoscope Kingdom cordially invites you to this year’s Royal Ball. Our kingdom bears many faces, uniting to remember the kaleidoscope of colors that bind us together, an alluring opulence of sparkelization. Come dressed in your finest sparkling, glowing, and magical ball attire, as you share with us this moment, filling the land with the love and applying it far beyond our realm. Under stars, lights, and magic, wonder is sure to unfold and entice the fantasies within, culminating in a kaleidoscopic performance by The Queens of the Cocks, Courtney Act, Willam, and Alaska.
FERAL: RECLAIM THE WILD Wednesday, 9PM-Midnight Join us for a night of carnality as we unleash the wildest party on the playa. An animal dwells within you, yearning to be released. This beast joyfully lives in the moment. Together we will set loose the wild creature inside all of us and awaken our instinctual sense of belonging. Be at one with nature, and come dressed to celebrate the plants and animals of the world. Free your heart, obey your senses, and go feral with us.
MAD HATTER TEA DANCE Thursday, 2PM-5PMFall down the rabbit hole into a wonderland hallucination of a day party as Alice in Playaland throws an epic tea dance party, where squirt guns are filled with magical potions, and glamorous hats are always on parade, our twisted ice teas might make you grow bigger, and plenty of wonderland mayhem will keep you on your toes. Don’t be late, you’ve got a very important date!
BLACK ROCK CITY HIGH'S HOMECOMING Friday, 7PM-10PM Black Rock City High School celebrates High School as it should have been, featuring all the freaks and geeks, jocks in jockstraps, cheerleaders, drama queens, lunch ladies, and everything in between. Dust off your pom-poms, boomboxes, and neon shades as we take it back to the old school with a sunset dance party, a homecoming photo booth, and some seriously spiked punch all to celebrate your Black Rock City Pride!
Link: http://www.glamcocks.com/index1.html

properties.name: Black Rock Spatial Delivery
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address: 7:00 & Center Camp Plaza, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:00 & Center Camp Plaza, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Since 1999 we have been doing uniformed bike messenger schtick; taking postcards (and we do custom runs of glossy postcards each year) and other schwag and delivering it all over the playa to people and then encouraging the recipients to send something to someone else through us in an ever-increasing chain of good vibes and silliness. We have delivered rutabagas, we've delivered people, we've even delivered a titanium spork to a person on a moving geodesic dome. We are unstoppable.
People come to our camp to send stuff or messages about the playa. They also have been coming to our camp and getting involved doing Spatial Deliveries of their own, after a quick training. The concept is simple and infinitely scalable. Over the past few years we've had dozens of deputized deliverators doing daring deeds.
Events:
Link: http://faludidesign.com/BRSD/BRSD.html

properties.name: Inflatable Wildlife Conservatory
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: When having an experience at the Inflatable Wildlife Conservatory, not only will you bring home the experience of touring some of the world’s most exotic inflatable wildlife, you will also bring home a sense of community and new friends that will last a lifetime. Our goal is to educate participants and embrace each species from our inflatable playa friends to each of us as individuals on the playa. Our mission of spreading unity and acceptance is most important to us as it is for the entire Burning Man community. We encourage each person experiencing the Inflatable Wildlife Conservatory to express themselves freely and embrace the beautiful creatures that they are.
We will be providing a bar underneath a medium sized shade structure and additional shade from large colorful banners throughout the camp. Additionally, we will be hosting a bar and gifting real life coconuts (with or without vodka) and giving 'playa tours' of our conservatory and plethora of inflatable wildlife spread. Each species of inflatable playa wildlife will have their own name and history and tours will be given to participants. Binoculars and safari hats will be provided for the duration of the tour.
We will also provide a community Flamingo Sanctuary for participants to lounge in comfort while enjoying our soothing electro swing tunes and sipping on their coconut drink.
Events: Tuesday 3-5pm - Inflatable Safari Tours followed by Sunset Drinks from 5-8pm Friday 3-5pm - Inflatable Safari Tours followed by Sunset Drinks from 5-8pm

properties.name: Sextant
properties.description:
Village: DUSTFISH Village
Sector: 7.5
Address: 6:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 6:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: First up: Massive Tesla Coils on the Playa! The Tesla Coil will be located on the Playa, just across from the Esplanade. Be mindful of the safety fence around the individual 32’ Tesla towers, but feel welcome to stroll through the Faraday Tunnel and stand at the very center of the action. Who will you meet while standing under 4 million Volts? This system will not have the harsh din of a typical Tesla Coil; expect the rumble of a low Bass note. Pro tip; visit the portos in advance!  Next up: our signature 52’ Tower right on the Esplanade! The Tower will be lit brightly and visible from across the Playa as a distinctive feature of our cityscape.Your journey up the Tower begins with a cozy shaded & lit lounge at Playa level with carpets, bean bags, pillows and blankets. Perfect for a friendly chat, or a full on cuddle puddle! We typically provide coffee table books and a massage table and other basic creature comforts to encourage people to spend time in a friendly and welcoming environment. Rest up and stay as long as you like 24/7.  Next, ascend to Vünderbar, Ze Bar In Ze Sky! The bar floor is 16’ off the Playa, but you may sit 19’ up on our leather stools and rest against the bar. Hang your purse on the hooks and take in the libations! New for 2015: Railings! Lean against the edges without fear of imminent death and look all around. Vünderbar is a place where ten to twenty fellow Burners may gaze out at the beauty of Black Rock City day and night, and meet new friends in an environment similar to an intergalactic departure lounge. That may be the love of your life two stools down; you better say hi! Vünderbar is a 24/7 establishment! That rope ladder isn’t going to climb itself! You will find the very top of the Tower features a 52’ tall Crow’s Nest for up to five people to see Black Rock City in all its glory! This is a great place to take photos. Spend as long as you like and remember, Radical Self Reliance! The Crow’s Nest is open 24/7! Climbing down a Tower is old news. Sextant strongly recommends that you take advantage of the Zip-Line clip-in point 48’ off the Playa (just beneath the Crow’s Nest)! Attach your provided safety harness to the trolley and soar over Black Rock City for 350’, all the way to Arcade Street. Due to the severity of the safety situation, Sextant only operates the Zip-Line if conditions are appropriate.After all this hustle and bustle on the Esplanade, we want to encourage you to explore the neighborhood! What better way to experience the intimacy of the off-Esplanade lifestyle, than to start at the Landing Zone Café at the end of the Zip-Line. You’ll find a laid-back atmosphere with some shade, chairs and bicycle parking (where applicable). Wake up your bartender and ask if they would be so kind as to share a drink with you!
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/sextantcamp







https://youtube.com/watch?v=xZzg2YHJi34

properties.name: Deep Sea Circus
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 8:45 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 8:45 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Need some energy for your nighttime adventures? Those who dare to venture beyond the jaws of the anglerfish will be rewarded with tasty coffee and undersea treats.
Events: COFFEE SERVICE Need some energy for your night out on the playa? Recharge in our angler fish lounge with a fresh cup of pour over coffee. B.Y.O.Cup! Monday, August 31st, 2015 7-11pm. Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 7-11pm. Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 7-11pm. Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 7-11pm Friday, September 4th, 2015 7-11pm.
CIRCUS INVERSIONS Learn how to do circus style handstands and headstands. We will also incorporate techniques from yoga, breakdancing, and contortion. Prerequisites: must have good upper body strength, must be well-hydrated, and must be sober! Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 6-7pm.
SIMPLE COFFEE ROASTING AT HOME If you can make popcorn, you can roast coffee! Learn the basics of roasting coffee at home using simple tools. Then try your hand at roasting a batch.Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 6-7pm.
POUR OVER COFFEE BREWING Learn the basic concepts behind why pour over coffee is so good, learn the basic procedure, and then try brewing some yourself! Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 6-7pm.

properties.name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
properties.description:
Village: Sin City
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 1800+ hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited touching is prohibited. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.

Location: 4:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye is home to Garnish, a member of the Burning Man Fire Conclave, and the Suck N' Fuck saloon. We are a group of fire performers, acrobats, aerialists, musicians, dancers, and shibari artists.This year we'll be having live music accompanied by various circus artists. Also home of Toolsday! 
Events: Our schedule is being finalized up to the event. // Monday: 9pm to midnight. Live music followed by trash hip hop and live music. // Tuesday: 8pm Toolsday, a celebration of all things Maynard. A wine tasting accompanied by the music of Tool, Perfect Circle and Puscifer. Followed by Goth/Industrial dance played by dj Ronabell. Wear all the black and come get your dark freak on with fire, aerial and shibari performances. Let us tie you and suspend you if you dare. // Wednesday: 9pm Garnish fire performance. One of Black Rock City's longest running fire troupes will be showcasing our Burn Night performance. Thirty Five dead sexy performers lighting up for your pleasure. Cocktails will be served. Followed by live music // Thursday: 9pm Cocktails and live music // Friday: 9pm cocktails and live music. // Saturday: Garnish performs in the Great Circle. The Suck N' Fuck may or may not be open!

properties.name: Salon Soleil
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Salon Soleil is a Burning Man theme camp and metaphysical community dedicated to personal exploration, self-expression, the richness of human experience and fabulous costumes. Our community includes healers, fire performers, musicians, artists, and shamans. You are welcome to enjoy our reflective quadruple Do-Me Domes for healing, relaxing, salon style discourse, and refuge from the chaotic energy of the city. Our burn barrel will be out front to provide a warming stop in the midst of a cold playa night.Our popular Healing Faire has become a well-loved playa tradition since 2007. We invite citizens of BRC to indulge in massage, reiki, facials, foot rubs, acro-yoga, astrology, I-Ching, tarot readings, chakra toning, sound healing and relationship counseling. Our healing faire has attracted many repeat visitors over the years, some of whom say that it was one of their best and most profound experiences on the playa. Throughout the week we also provide a space for healers to offer services.In addition to our healing faire, we will be hosting several chamber music performances and a tuesday night funk dance party. We also provide recharging services for small batteries using the magical solar energy system that powers our camp grid. And we will be home to Sutra the Polar Bear mutant vehicle along with other small art projects.
Events:
Link: http://www.salonsoleil.org

properties.name: Orphans Too
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: ORPHANS TOO is part of the Orphanage group of camps and is dedicated to providing a haven in Black Rock City for virgin burners and lost orphans from around the world. The camps started in 2010 with the original Orphan Endorphin camp, and has now expanded to three camps. The concept behind the Orphanage is that each camp offers a different experience for the virgin and orphan burner. The main Orphan Endorphin camp offers an ‘urban’, loud and busy, experience being located at 7:00 & A in 2015. ORPHANS TOO offers a quieter, less busy, ‘suburban experience. The third camp, Li’l Orphan Annex is in a very quiet, ‘rural’ location, located at 7:15 & H. ORPHANS TOO has a strong ethos of participation and nurturing virgin and orphan burners.  
ORPHANS TOO has expanded over the last two years, and now has a significant amount of interactivity. A lot of this interactivity comes from the virgin burners themselves. In 2015 we have 46 virgin burners out of a camp of 72. The ORPHANS TOO team works hard with our virgins to encourage them to work together in the months leading up to the burn to plan a variety of interactivity. One example of this is a group of our virgins this year forming a music and theatre troupe called the “Hard Knocks”. They are planning various events for the week. Another example is the creation of a “Cabinet of Curios” in the theme of the Carnival of Mirrors - again, being planned by a group of our virgin burners. A third example is the suggestion by one of our virgins that we expand the Funky Flower Garden to include Funky Creatures such as insects, lizards and butterflies – and she will be bringing materials to the playa to allow people to create their own on the playa.
Events: -THE ASYLUM BAR is an extremely popular suburban bar on the playa. It was located at 7.10 & H in 2014 and was busy throughout the whole week, mainly during the day and up until about midnight. The bar provides high-quality beer and vodkas to the public all week. The bar provides high quality microbrews and ciders from across the US, as well as homebrews from the Orphanage Homebrewers Group. The microbrews for 2015 are : Maui CoConut Porter, Old Guardian Barley Wine, Dogfish Head 90-minute IPA, Victory Golden Monkey, Stone Stochasticity Project Grapefruit Slam IPA, Dirtwolf Double IPA, Angry Orchard Cider and Ace Joker Dry Hard Cider. Home brews will include Hoppy Wheat, Unicorn Blood, Ginger Beer, Hibiscus Saison and White Trash Champagne. There will be a variety of home infused vodkas, some of them smooth and more-ish, others lip-curlingly punchy! 
-BARON OINK’S LATEX VAC BED & FLOGGING STOOL is scary but kinky. The Vac Bed is a 9 foot high blood red latex envelope, where one or two people can be vacuum sandwiched. Imagine Hans Solo encased in carbonite, but more saucy! The flogging stool is where victims can experience a flogging from a variety of whips, tawse, and floggers (consensual of course). Being encased in latex AND being flogged at the same time is the best experience!
-THE FUNKY FLOWER GARDEN is a very simple Art Project concept. But also very effective and interactive. The idea was borne from the close relationship between the ORPHANS TOO camp and the Netherlands burner community. Jason Avery (me) was a member of the Netherlands Burning Man Committee. The idea is that anyone can design and create a Funky Flower and bring it to the playa to be enjoyed. Ideally Funky Flowers are lit at night. The flowers can be very simple or extremely bizarre. Usually up to 2 feet high. Anybody can design and create a Funky Flower and bring it to ORPHANS TOO. Including people from other camps and the wider Burning Man community. We will even be encouraging burners who are not coming to Burning Man this year to create Funky Flowers and have someone else bring them on their behalf. In 2015, at the suggestion of one of our virgin burners, we shall be expanding the Funky Flower Garden to include Funky Creatures such as spiders, lizards and butterflies.
-THE BIG TOP BOUDOIR is the ORPHANS TOO hangout to relax in. Every year we create this relaxing space in the theme of the year. In 2015 it will be in the style of a Big Top Boudoir. Again, the virgins in our camp are working together to design and decorate the space, including carnival mirrors and masks. The Boudoir will be open to the whole of Black Rock City 24 hours per day all week. We regularly have many visitors that use it as a place to relax and reflect. Included within the Big Top Boudoir will be the CABINET OF CURIOS. In the style of the carnival, this will be a cabinet display where people will bring bizarre artifacts either to display, or to gift.
- he HARD KNOCKS is a troupe of musical and theatrical performers. Coincidentally, of our 46 virgin burners, many are musicians and actors. We have therefore formed a troupe of virgin burners who will be putting on various performances throughout the week. There will be live music and live theatre. It is amazing what can be achieved by properly recruiting and encouraging virgin burners!
-OTHER PROJECTS. We are also planning other ad-hoc art projects. For example, one of our virgins is making a human-sized Ouija board. And others are making an art project around helium balloons lit at night.  
-Finally, the SPUTNIK fire barrel is an ORPHANS TOO institution, having been procured for the camp back in 2011. Together with the Asylum Bar it is a magnet for the citizens of BRC to warm themselves as they are exploring the suburbs.
Link: http://orphanendorphin.com

properties.description:

Sector: 3
Address: 4:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Gallavant is a truly extraordinary entity.   With unique personalities, a famous/infamous rum bar, and the mighty USS Nevada; our camp provides an opportunity for all of those who choose, to experience things wondrous and exceptional
Events: Come party with the Pirates of the Playa at Gallavant, home of our mighty ship the ""USS Nevada"" and our infamous ARRGH Bar, serving up our ""Se(a)men"" and other grogs...We ""officially"" open Monday with Naked Pirate shots from 10am-12pm, Scottish Bucks Fizz and Bucky shots from 12pm-3pm, Tuesday from 12pm-2pm we try to ""Prevent Scurvy"" with citrus rum shots and JESUS and BABYCAKES are getting married and we'll celebrate from 5pm-whenever...Wednesday we celebrate Danish Christmas with breakfast herring and schnapps and will indulge on Apple Pie Moonshine from 4pm-6pm, Thursday...it's a surprise party from 4pm-6pm, Friday we head to the ""Great White North"" for Canuck kisses from 2pm-4pm, Saturday from 2pm-4pm join us for yet another surprise party and of course, amazing Bloody Marys on Sunday morning from 10am-12pm..We have an awesome ""chill space"" with lots of couches and shade, great music and a rowdy crew of Wicked Wenches and Swashbuckling Pirates that are always up for the best time possible as we ""Belly up to the bar and say ""AARRRRGGGHHH""

properties.name: Camp Deep C
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address: 3:00 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV

Description: Camp Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. properties.name: Dare to be Rare
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 2
Address: 2:15 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 2:15 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Welcome to Dare to be Rare. We are a protein inspired day camp that practices the 10 Principles of Burning Man as well as the five food groups for the week we are on playa. Meat, Grain (by way of spirits), Meat, Water, and did I mention Meat? We are a newly formed camp with its co-leaders having a combined experience of 13 years on playa. 
We are a participatory day theme camp were we run a number of inclusive events during the week to entice the playa community to join in our fun. We are inclusive & participative, engaging & hardworking, and a fun loving group of people. Is this your new home? Our intentions are simple. We are here to have a great time and to give back to our playa community and grow our family year on year. Running our events and seeing all the smiling faces fills us with gratitude and appreciation and we would expect this to be true for you if you choose to join our family. 
During the week we run 4-5 events that camp members participate in. Our Beats n Badges we so popular last year we are setting up all week long. Come and make a burning man badge keepsake for your week. Tues & Thursday we will be opening up our 16x20 adult Twister game (Tanked Twister) - come and get twisted with us. Wednesday is our big signature event. Na Meat Stay (previously Burning Beef & Bison) BBQ. The only Beef & Bison BBQ on the playa. This will be our 7th year running the BBQ which has always been a huge success . Later in the week we will be running Sexy Jenga games for all to play as well as a new themed yoga practice, Yoga for Better Sex. We think these will be very popular with the community too.
Events: All week, Beats n Badges Monday 1-3pm: Meat n Great mixer Tuesday 2-4: Tanked Twister Wednesday 2-6 HUGE BBQ. Na-Meat Stay Thursday: 11-12 Yoga for Better Sex Thursday: 1-3pm Tanked Twister
Link: http://www.daretoberare.rocks/

properties.name: The Hang-Out
properties.description:
Village: Center Camp Plaza
Sector: 6
Address: 10:15 Center Camp Plaza
Location: 10:15 Center Camp Plaza
Description: Hammocks, hammocks, and more hammocks swinging in the playa breeze filled with dusty desert nymphs, lost souls and the fortunate weary traveler who seeks our special version of Nirvana. The music never repeats, but the bliss it brings never ends. Come play with Satyr and his minions for an hour or the day and you will leave better than when you arrived. We are all things hammock and hammock related activities. Hand's down, we've the sweetest spot on the playa to recharge your essence and escape the desert sun.
Who, what, and where are we?
*Satyr created the Hang-Out's original design in 2003. The camp unofficially debuted in 2006---that year Goat and Satyr were able to successfully sneak in early on Friday pre-event, and planted stakes on 8:30 and B. And yes, we lied through our teeth!*  In 2009, Arassi, Orion, and Satyr set-up the most current version of the expanded structure---Only 3 people!!!! That was also the year the Hang-Out became officially recognized by the BRC organization as an exceptional structure and placed us in center camp. We've been coming back bigger and better every since. This year is no exception. *In 2011, Orion has reinvented the structures' 1st and 2nd gen hardware into a new addition---the Diamond in the Rough, but don't expect to see it from the street. You'll have to come visit us "in the back", as it's part of the Hide-Out (aka- our private area). *No other playa structure of this size and grandeur can be assembled with so few peeps and have so little impact on the playa.
We look forward to hanging-out with you!
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/150704538339546/

properties.name: Disco Chateau
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address: 3:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 3:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Disco Chateau is a Bay Area based Burning Man camp that brings cuddles and comfort to the Playa each year. With over 150 members from 20 different countries, the Disco Chateau family is brought together through common values of community, creativity, love, playfulness, and authenticity. 
Our Cuddle Puddle is a massive structure filled with stuffed animals. Our Kinky Spa and Relaxing Lounge provide serene spaces for comfort, performance, and play. Our gourmet French Ass Dinners are an oasis of delectable luxury in the harsh desert. Throughout each space, our DJs create amazing soundscapes that bring the camp to life.
In 2015, we are expanding on each of these gifts. We are creating a larger Cuddle Puddle, a kinkier spa, a more lavish lounge, more French Ass Dinners, and more DJs.
Events:
Link: http://www.discochateau.com/#home

properties.description:

Sector: 9
Address: 8:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 8:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: A Parea in Greek culture is a group of friends who regularly gather together to share their experiences about life, their philosophies, values and ideas. The Parea is really a venue for the growth of the human spirit, the development of friendships and the exploration of ideas to enrich our quality of life that is all too brief in time. In Greece, the Parea is a long-lasting circle and cycle of life nourished by the people who participate.

properties.name: Bat Carnival
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We are the spine-tingling fright of the funhouse mixed with the thrill of carnival games of chance. We have have bats in our belfry and tricks up our sleeves. We will have stick ponies for general use, and will lead trail rides around our neighborhood to see the sights, visit art installments and other favorite camps of BRC. Our camp has a variety of carnival style games of skill and luck including but not limited to: Dr. Teeth (Teeth knock out game), Bowling, Spooky Can Knock Down, Stand The Bottle, Eyeball Shootout and Ghost Ball Toss. Participants will be awarded with carny style “tattoos,” sweet or spicy treats for all and spirits for the adults. We also host Heckled Mad-Libs and a ""face in a hole""/""head in a hole"" hand painted board for participants to get their photo taken with to commemorate stopping by our camp at Burning Man 2015. The plan will be to change this board every year for return participants to be able to get a different image yearly.
Events: Our carnival is limited to daylight hours as the bats must fly at night. Trail rides will be hosted Wednesday and Friday at 5pm. Games run from 10amish-until dark and are free to play even if the Bats are away! (Just remember to leave it as good or better than you found it!) Heckled Mad-Libs are spontaneous and somewhat dependent on the amount of passers-by.
Link: https://www.facebook.com/TheBatCarnival

Drop by and tell us about your favorite animals. We offer a meat and protein positive vibe with discussion of sustainable practices and balance. i.e meat good, bacon better! Come by and spin the Wheel O Meat for a drink or a smack on the ass, with love of course..
Events: 1pm to 4pm Tuesday thru Friday

properties.name: Celestial Bodies
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We are a fun-loving, straight-friendly theme camp in the Gayborhood. We serve up a delicious and refreshingly-iced Playa Cosmo - our signature cocktail on the playa - every day in our comfy lounge.
Please stop by, say hello, enjoy a cocktail, get a free dusty hug and join us fun events and daily activities.
Events: Art Inside Me Discovery Party Monday 1-5pm - If you were a blank canvas, how would you fill it?Join Celestial Bodies for an interactive, fun experience during which you will connect to the power of diversity by bringing your inner voice to life, on canvas, as ART. //
Tutu Tattoo Tuesday 1-6pm - A Celestial Bodies tradition. We adorn your gorgeous body with our camp tattoo while admiring your tutu and Moonshine and Tripod serve you a refreshing Playa Cosmo. Come strut your stuff and twirl your tutu for all to enjoy. //  Naked Pub Crawl Wednesday - Celestial Bodies will again be a host camp for the annual bike ride through the city. We’ll be serving our signature Playa Cosmo. The ride starts at the man at 11am. //
Get Your Freak On Thursday 1-6 pm - Come dressed in your freakiest carnival attire and party with Celestial Bodies all afternoon and into the night. Enjoy funky arcade games, win prizes, costume photo-ops, mask making and much much more. Other exhibitors and carnies are welcome to share our lounge to share their carny talents and gifts with the community. //
T-shirt Painting Thursday & Friday 2-6 pm - Celestial Bodies provides easels, stencils and spray paint to spiff up your T’s. Create your 2015 Burn and Celestial Bodies souvenirs.
// Carnival Madness Friday 8pm – Midnight Join GoGo and LaLa at Celestial Bodies for a rock’n night of old school and funky mixes. This is a techno-free event.
Link: http://www.campcelestialbodies.org/

properties.name: BRC Hash House Harriers (BRCH3)
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 9:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 9:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Our mission is to share our love of hashing with Black Rock City while keeping the beer cold and bikes running smoothly. 
What is hashing? Hashing is a little game we like to play. In a nutshell, Hashers like to call themselves a drinking group with a running problem. We run and frolic, stopping to enjoy a cold beverage and sing a song or two. Based on the child’s game, hare and hound, hashing requires a “hare” to mastermind and set a running trail. With a small head start, the “hare” lays a trail using flour (on the playa we use survey flags that are swept after trail is complete) with a group of “hounds” leaving shortly after with the goal of catching the hare. Your average hash trail is about 3 -4 miles long, ending with a cold adult beverage and song singing.
Please visit our site http://brch3.com/about-us/ to learn more about hashing and about our awesome campers!
Events: Daily bike repair, evening happy hours, and much much more, including our 8th Annual RED DRESS RUN on Thursday, September 3rd at 3p.m. - meet us at the MAN!
http://brch3.com/events/
Link: http://brch3.com/

properties.name: Catification
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:30 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:30 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: To continue the spirit of gifting, our theme camp seeks to create an environment where cat lovers & friends are welcome to express themselves. Through mediated interactions with the greater community, we assist them to appear and communicate more like cats. We stand ready to protect our camp from exploitation by dog lovers with a terrifying ‘hiss’. We welcome all to substitute their everyday world of consumption for a participatory experience through Catification.
Events: Art Project: Come by day or night and see our art project - a human sized scratching post covered in fun textures! It will be large enough for burners to scratch their claws on, rub up against, and interact with however they please. Hanging off the top will be a disco ball. At night, it will be lit up creating a cat's heaven of little reflected dots to chase around!
Registered Event: Come get cat-ified! Create your very own cat ears & collar, then get your cat nose and whiskers painted on; communicating in meows is enthusiastically encouraged. We will have a giant scratching post for you to scratch, rub up against, or enjoy in a manner befitting a cat with interactive features day and night. BYO Cat Toys and/or Cat Nip. Reminder: the playa is not a litter box, please use the porta potties.
Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 4–6pm Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 4–6pm Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 4–6pm 
Link: http://www.catificationcamp.com/

properties.name: PlayaSkool
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 10
Address: 10:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 10:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We are Play)A(Skool - an international group of movers and shakers dedicated to creating a learning and experiential platform for citizens to Black Rock City to participate in. We are the home of TEDxBlackRockCity and proud to host the 5th annual TEDx on playa. In addition we host Black Rock City Art Forum where the makers, designers, and operators of Art Cars share their stories with all. We host Fuck Up Fridays where you can share you story of your greatest fuck up and what you learned from it. On Saturday, we are all things Burning Man and we feature speakers from different areas of Burning Man to share their stories with you. In addition we have some pretty legendary parties . . . our Tuesday Homecoming Party is always a great way to start your Burn. On Friday night, we feature some of the best up and coming International DJ's. At Play)A(Skool we believe that sharing leads to learning. And learning leads to personal growth. And personal growth - helps us evolve.
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/playaskool/?fref=ts

Description: Third Space Place (3SP), located in Home Rule Village, celebrates “third spaces” – social, relaxing locations that offer a sense of place beyond the two usual environments of home (“first space”) and work (“second space”). A true “third space,” 3SP’s comfortable retreat will offer shaded conversations throughout the day, warm fireside chats at night, and interactive events that 3SP hopes will entice our Black Rock City community to stop by, have a chat, and Participate!

properties.name: Synapse Conduit
properties.description:
https://youtube.com/watch?v=C67gX9LOmrw

Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: At Camp Synapse Conduit, we serve cocktails every afternoon Monday to Friday. Our goal is to create opportunities for all to experience unanticipated moments of magic through positive connections, both interpersonal and intrapersonal. For campers and visitors alike, we provide an environment for creation, discovery, and/or positive transformation of relationships with others. We also strive to help our visitors to more easily access and appreciate their own best selves through playful interactions, stimulating conversations, and generosity of spirit.
Events: The bar is open in the day time. There will be games, gifts, karaoke, t-shirt making, fortune telling, and who knows what else...

properties.name: The Flamingo Trap
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 4:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Are the flamingos the prey, the bait or the predator? Come visit The Flamingo Trap to find out!
We've got two public domes. The Flamingome will be shady and full of arts, crafts and games during the day and will be hosting quirkily themed music nights of an evening. The Stardome will be a cozy shady space 24/7 but after dark it will really shine with a 1700 strong LED light show accompanied by weird and wonderful soundscapes.
Tuesday will see us host an Aussie themed BBQ, we'll have all sorts of arts and crafts during the week and make sure you drop by and create a mutant flamingo for our flock at some point.
The camp that flocks together rocks together!
Events: Monday 7pm - Teegan & Chris's wedding You're invited to what promises to be a both heartfelt and hilarious nuptial ceremony. There will be gumbo served at a nearby camp following the ceremony. RSVP here: https://www.facebook.com/events/1667831943438321/
Tuesday 2pm to 6pm -'Straya Day An aussie BBQ full of Australian treats and games to try. We'll be playing aussie tunes and there will be a koala to hug. This is also the official on playa meet up for Aussies. https://www.facebook.com/events/1443214062667309/
Wed to Sat 1pm to 3pm - Mutant Flamingo Craft Sessions & Happy Hour We’re bringing hundreds of pink plastic lawn flamingos and all sorts of craft supplies for you to decorate them with. Come chill out in our 30ft geodesic Flamingome, groove along to some tunes and make new friends while you get your craft on! Once you’ve created your masterpiece it will take pride of place amongst the flock in our roadside lagoon. Our flamingo crafting sessions are both kid and adult friendly and conveniently line up with our camp’s flappy hour! We’ll be serving our camp cocktail ‘The Featherless Flamingo’ in all its sickly sweet pink glory!
Link: http://theflamingotrap.org/

properties.description:
Village: Illumination Village
Sector: 3
Address: 2:55 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 2:55 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Since 1999, a group of enthusiastic pinhole photographers has been harvesting interaction, preserving history, and challenging conventional assumptions about photography at Burning Man. Our aim is to document the people, art and events at Burning Man each year, while we teach others to explore their creativity through this hundred year old technique of pinhole photography.
Events: Meet us each day at 10:00 to learn more about our artwork and maybe even go out and take a few shots with us. In the evening, we develop the day's photos in our Desert Darkroom. 
Link: http://pinholeproject.org/about

properties.name: Church of the Fifth Element
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:30 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:30 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Burning Man affords individuals opportunities to shed societal constraints and safely experience what their true their potential could be. This is the foundation for empowering individuals to radically transform the world around them. Our camp is focused on providing a set of experiences for individuals to do just that. Our name “Church of the 5th Element” emphasizes that one’s potential can be unlocked and amplified when juxtaposing the elements of the external world (earth, wind, fire, and water) with the most powerful element – the individual. The programming that we have created – including climbing structures, fire sculptures, open mic events, a fashion show, and live music — pushes individuals to examine all aspects of themselves – mind, body, and spirit within the context of the four elements.
Events: Evenings, come and watch the world burn: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1373872212/watch-the-world-burn-a-fire-sculpture
Link:

Description: Every city needs a skatepark. We build the one at Black Rock City. SK8 KAMP is a 24/7 skatepark where we encourage everyone to try out skateboarding or riding any wheeled vehicles. This year we will have a wide, mellow half pipe, a creative obstacle sidewalk and a large rolling to kicker onto a big Bagjump airbag. We're back for the 5th yearSupport our Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1521106450/sk8-kamp-2015-burning-mans-skateboard-park
Events: Fake Boarding Competition - Invented on the playa in 2014. Come show off your outrageous moves and compete for a Fake Trophy - Friday 5-7PM // Sparkle Pony Skate Joust - Put on your favorite Sparkle Pony outfit and drop in on the half pipe opposite your opponent and see who wipes out first - Wednesday 4-6PM // Learn to Skate Clinics - No better place to learn to Skate than on the Playa. Come learn from our esteemed instructors. Boards and pads provided. All levels welcome. Tuesday and Thursday 10-12PM // Skate and Destroy Party - This is when it gets real. Come shred our ramps or watch skaters risk their lives and heckle on the megaphone. With Daft Punk, Tony Hawk, and free ponies and many more. Thursday 9PM-Friday 6AM // N8KED SK8 - Naked skate session. Need we say more - Saturday 12-2PM
Link: http://www.facebook.com/sk8kamp
properties.Description: Every city needs a skatepark. We build the one at Black Rock City. SK8 KAMP is a 24/7 skatepark where we encourage everyone to try out skateboarding or riding any wheeled vehicles. This year we will have a wide, mellow half pipe, a creative obstacle sidewalk and a large rolling to kicker onto a big Bagjump airbag. We're back for the 5th yearSupport our Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1521106450/sk8-kamp-2015-burning-mans-skateboard-park

properties.name: Scatter Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 8:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 8:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: SCATTER CAMP pays tribute to the all but forgotten Prince of Mayhem, who once reigned over GRACELAND with a bottle of Bourbon and an unbridled libido.
This pampered Prince was draped in the finest studded outfits. With a swig of aged spirits and a smoke of tobacco, he often bounced around his Jungle Room exposing himself to many a Courtesan. The KING and his entourage were quite amused and reveled in Scatter's antics. Until one day, an intoxicated and aroused Scatter exploded through the door of Graceland's TV Room, where one of the King's men was (TCB) Taking Care of Business with a young Starlet. The King's angry guest hurled Scatter bluntly against the wall and rendered him unconscious.
Graceland's Heir Apparent was banished to a climate control room with no more elixirs. He apparently went ape shit and passed on; or as the story goes.
Events:
Link:

properties.name: Dark Sparkle
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address: 9:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 9:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what causes people to push their limits to the point of insanity, what causes nice guys to finish last, that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. Dark Sparkle is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that we know citizens of BRC embrace.
Events: Live Burlesque shows, Wed & Fri @ 4                 DNA extraction workshop, Thu @ 11                   Pastie Making workshop, Thu afternoon

properties.name: Camp Conception
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address: 7:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 7:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Creepshow Peepshow: interactive art and dance event. Be an observer or participant in our freaky adult art installation. Your choice. This is coupled with our annual Thursday night dance featuring international DJ's // Beard Spa: Come get your beard, face and other parts trimmed, cleaned, and massaged  // Cha Cha Bitch: A latin music dance event to celebrate the feminine  // Loin Cloth Workshop: We provide materials and instruction for you to create a costume of your liking  // Shiva Huts and Bindi Parlors: A series of small shrines for you to travel through and experience the creative experience // Detox/Retox Happy Hour: Come get some electrolytes and maybe some massage followed by a hearty shot of tequila.
Events: Conception is looking forward to seeing you on the playa this year! Check out our list of exhibits and events below for a taste of what we have in store for you at 7:00 and Donniker.                              ** Shop and Swap Clothing Rack (Always open) Take a piece, leave a piece - this shopping rack is by Burners, for Burners! Did you bring a costume or accessory that's awesome but just isn't tickling you pink? Trade it out! Extra points for dropping off glitz, glam, ridiculousness, and spare pieces to adorn your neighbors. Come get snazzy at Camp Conception's Shop and Swap! ** The Shiva Huts and Bindi Parlour (Always open) Our cozy huts each house fascinating exhibits that will take you on a journey through the creative process itself: Preparation, Incubation, Illumination, and Verification. You will be rewarded with a bindi that reflects upon your journey. ** Make your own loincloth workshop (Mon, Wed and Friday 1:00PM-2:30PM) Feel like covering your loins, in a fabulous way? We provide a wide array of materials, the tools, designs, and instruction, and you can walk away wearing your own creation. We will have beats and treats to help you work. ** Collab-Oh-rative Painting Open Canvas (Mon-Fri 1:00-5:00PM) Participate in the conception of community art – start or finish where others have left off. Contributors paint as much as or as little as they want; Participants enter their camp location/contact information and a name is drawn to determine who receives the masterpiece of collective vision. ** Detox/ Retox (Mon, Wed and Fri 1:00PM-3:00PM) Come by our camp for an afternoon delight of electrolyte elixirs for replenishment, immediately followed by delicious retoxifying libations. ** Captain Scurvy's Shanty Grog-along (Tues 3:00PM-4:00PM) Arrgh me boys! Let the seafaring ballads of old (and our playa grog) take you away to the high seas! Got a Shanty? Bring and sing a shanty! We'll be whaling away the afternoon with traditional and playafied ballads, hauls, pilot songs, and Sea Porn. ** Dr. Scrote's Circumcision Wagon and Calamari Hut (Tues and Thurs 3:30PM-5:00) Location: Look for us around BRC We’re back! The CWCH offers a twisted parody/commentary on that age old ritual, along with fresh 'n' tasty calamari rings - freshest catch on the playa! ** Beard Spa (Wed 3:00PM-5:00PM) Pamper your facial follicles in our deluxe day spa for beards and mustaches. Rejuvenating, relaxing, and good for your hair! https://www.facebook.com/events/724595204335062/  ** Freak Show/Peep Show Pahty (Thurs 9PM-2:00AM) Bring out yer freaks! Attendees to our dancey-pants party are encouraged to wear their freakiest gear and costumes. Extra appendages strongly encouraged. Dance to our great lineup of house music DJs..come and watch a peep/freak show, or do one yourself in our special freak exhibit hall! https://www.facebook.com/events/1650781498492945/  ** Cha Cha Bitch Dance (Friday 1:00PM-3:00PM) It’s time to “Cha Cha Bitch!” Join Camp Conception’s DJ Mz ArTiz on her two hour set of Salsa, Reggaton, Bachata, and other funky Latin Beats to get your hips and feet moving. Mz ArTiz’s Latin beats will have you leave the playa dust behind and step into the imaginary tropics of your mind. https://www.facebook.com/events/839353906134076/  ** Awaken La Luna (Friday 3:00PM-5:00PM) As dusk approaches praise the Divine Feminine on the dancefloor at the party thrown by the huntresses of Camp Conception and their favorite bears. Featuring lunar body work sessions led by Artemis and the Camp Conception DJs!
Link: http://www.campconception.com/collective/

properties.name: SILICON VILLAGE
properties.description:
Village: Silicon Village
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ladies and Gentlemen, boys and girls of all ages, open your eyes and your mind to the mysteries and wonders of Silicon Village (look for our tower and archway). Travel to the distant other side of our Stargate, travel at feet per second on our 200' zipline, climb a tower, explore what is beyond this world with a tarot reading. Are you timid of heart? Then relax, have a drink, and enjoy a fire hooping show, choose a heart on to be painted on you, watch the bees dance. Early bird? Have a coffee. Feel the need for salt? Have a pickle. Feeling naughty? Have a cookie but at a price (or pleasure). After all of this and you are still feeling blue then visit a Happy Spot. At the end of the day control light with your mind or sit in our sauna dome. Is your mind blown? No? Well aren't you the adventurous soul. Okay then, hop on one of our art cars or dance to a laser light show. If that doesn't make your day then be a part of a game show or our Twerkin' Fashion show.
Events: http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=Silicon+Village
Link: http://siliconvillageburners.org

Village: BRC HOA
Sector: 4.5
Address: 5:00 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 5:00 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Billowing white fabric surrounds our waterless pillow pools where the tired burner can take an afternoon nap. Learn new skills at one of our daytime workshops or groove to some tunes. My hand is holding your hand but we're such Super Friends you feel my hand on your heart... or in your brain.
Events: stay tuned for our schedule including Pipe Cleaner Hat Making, Glow Workshop, Head Neck & Face Massage, Robot Santa vs Santa: The Final Battle, Gypsy Circus Music Hour, Art-ificial Intelligence, Drum Circle Workshop, Disney Dance Hour, Late Night Fantasia, and more!

properties.Events: stay tuned for our schedule including Pipe Cleaner Hat Making, Glow Workshop, Head Neck & Face Massage, Robot Santa vs Santa: The Final Battle, Gypsy Circus Music Hour, Art-ificial Intelligence, Drum Circle Workshop, Disney Dance Hour, Late Night Fantasia, and more!

Address: 2:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Location: 2:30 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Walter (the World's largest VW Bus) and his mutant vehicle family --- Big Red, Heathen (the fire-breathing Fire Truck), KALLIOPE, Pug Bug, the Peace Train and the Movement of Jah People are often seen cruising the playa but love to welcome all Burners home to our little corner of dusty heaven to play, party, and peace out with the friendly Camp Walter tribe. Come join us in our first year on Esplanade and share in our joyful revelry with spirits, dancing and music. We hope to inspire everyone to let loose and look beyond what is to what might be.

Location: 4:45 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We teach you how to keep it up. A hula hoop, that is. So many people never learned to hoop as kids because they didn't have the right teacher or the right hoop. We can get you spinnin in 10 minutes or less. Hooping is not only FUN, it's a great core exercise that burns 300 to 600 calories per hour. So, whether you want to hoopdance or just rock out - come by and let us teach you some new tricks. 
Events: Monday - Thursday 10 a.m.to noon - OPEN classes
Tuesday 12:30 - We're having a Beer Jam with Hoops!

properties.name: Disorient
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 8:00 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Disorient has been a camp at Burning Man since 2001. 2014 was the year of the Gold Bug at Disorient. Our camp's superficy was 120,000+ sq. ft. at 2:15 & Esplanade with 328 campers. In front, the Arch was crowned by Helios (Leo's new rendering of the DEX Crown) and the 2014 Disorient Sign by Viktor and the Soviet Block. Disorient Posters by The Two Jasons wrapped the inside of the Arch which led into the Dome in which Francois K and friends shared musical insights on Disorient's 6:1 sound system. Of the 7 art cars moored at Disorient this year, particularly noticeable was the DEX 2014 iteration performed by Elixir, B-Shyne and the Disorient Philadelphia Cell.
Events:
Link: http://www.disorient.info

Interactivity includes:
1 The Cool Mist Experience - misting booth with pleasant surprises.
2 Mist'R Cool's Zipper - 180 foot zip-line
3 The Cool Cube Conundrum - giant 3D Soma wooden block puzzle.
4 Cool Vibes - new type of external orgasmic vibrator for Goddesses. Appointment necessary to insure it is properly cleaned and covered.
5 Cool Jig - giant wooden almost vertical jigsaw puzzle.
6 The Knowledge Tree - pick the apples and the tree talks to you.
