properties.name: Playa Bike Repair
properties.description:
Village: 9:00 Portal
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: PLAYA BIKE REPAIR is both a service and a theme camp.– We provide bike rentals, transport, and repair for Burners worldwide.
PRE-PLAYA:– Rent a bike online.– We transport your bike to the playa!– Claim your rental bike at our camp at 9:00 Plaza.– Proceeds help fund Playa Bike Repair.
IN BLACK ROCK CITY:– We run a Bike Repair Camp.– Mechanics drop in. Friendly, nurturing, and supportive, they would love to help you fix your bike!– Last year at Burning Man, our camp helped over 4,000 people fix their bikes (Free!)
AFTER BURN:– We offer bike transport and storage.
CAMPING FOR MEMBERS:– We are presently open to new members. Please join us!
Events: We're open Sunday to Sunday, 11-7.
Link: http://www.PlayaBikeRepair.com

properties.name: Simian Akademy of Anthropomorphic Sciences
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Come one, come all to Dr. Googol's Simian Akademy and marvel at the advances made in the Anthropomorphic Sciences -- the most astounding of natural philosophies! See the Octopus Pavilion! Marvel at the dexterity of trained monkeys as they demonstrate their industrious utility by repairing velocipedes of every sort and size! And lest we neglect the fairer sex, consult with our resident Mistress of Olfaction who will concoct a custom perfume for you right before your very eyes!
Events: Burdened with useless swag? How about something useful? Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11. Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could. You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man. Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday from 11am-12 noon.
Monkey Wrench Station will attempt to help anyone with a bike, costume, or small mechanical malfunction. Spin the Wheel of Fortune to determine your fate. Will our team of trained monkeys fix your dolorous disaster or break it altogether? Only the hand of fate knows. Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9-10 am.

properties.name: Black Rock Roller Disco
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Black Rock Roller Disco is Burning Man's roller skating rink. This will be our 15th year bringing our fun, exciting, inclusive world of roller skating from San Francisco's Golden Gate Park and the Church of 8 Wheels to the playa to spread "rolligion" to the burning world and we have a funky good time doing it. We're open 24/7 with yoga in the morning. The Black Rock Rollergirls take over on Thursday evening with a fantastic version of roller derby on the playa. We have over 100 pairs of skates, but it's best to have your own. Come be a party of it anytime!!!
Events: Every Morning - 8AM. - Yoga with BarbaraMac
Every Afternoon @ 1PM - Learn to Skate with the GodFather
Thursday @6PM - Ass kickin' Roller Derby - Playa Style!!!
Special guest DJ's playing and spinning throughout the week
Link: http://www.cora.org/BlackRockRollerDisco2015.html







https://youtube.com/watch?v=L32CNfJUfMQ



https://youtube.com/watch?v=YYITPeQMbRw

properties.name: It's All Made Up (IAMU)
properties.description:
Village: Home Rule Village
Sector: 4.5
Address: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City
Description: It’s All Made Up (IAMU) is a Burning Man camp and collaborative community that exists to create. Once you do something, it’s hard to believe that you can’t. So we create experiences, tools, services, connections and opportunities that help each of us get the transformations we are up to. That can be anything. For fun.
On Playa we live in Home Rule Village, along with our sister camps: Pedal Pies, Gold Star, Third Space Place, Iguana Chill Camp and Flamin’ Java. We organize the DC Containers and our charter Burner Express bus. We also aim to design and build an amazing camp that lets anyone be the best you that you are. Maybe that means authenticity, improv, forgiveness, dancing, art, spinning or a rooftop bar.
Back in DC, NYC, LA, SF and further flung places, we connect Burners and all manner of creators who are up to making their lives, cities, projects and ventures better, more real. For fun. Quality trouble. Because we can. We all can.
Events:
Link: http://www.itsallmadeup.org/

properties.name: Zerodrome
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:15 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We do: Spoken Word - - Amazing speeches - Mutant Vehicle Explorations - Redesigning Discarded Bikes for Children with terminal illnesses after the event.
Our mission is to facilitate the exchange of knowledge about mutant vehicle construction and improvement. On playa, Zerodrome hosts a series of show-and-tell discussions. We invite mutant vehicle owners to mentor others through participation at camp and afterward.
- We seek new members.- We invite neighboring camps to merge resources, such as kitchens with us- Want anyone with a passionate or incredible message to share to visit our stage.
Events:
Link: http://www.zerodrome.com

Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Now in our fifth year on playa Home Rule Village is committed to engaging BRC denizens in novel forms of expression exploration relaxation and connection. Seven unique camps (IAMU, Pedal Pies, Gold Star, 3SP, Iguana Chill) combine to offer a wildly diverse experience including an array of workshops seminars dance parties vaudeville shows improve comedy classes holistic healing diversity-awareness events yoga practice body painting classes blind taste-testing dinners fire spinning and more!

properties.name: Snow Koan Solar
properties.description:
Village: Nectar Village
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Each day our camp hosts a snow cone cocktail party during the late afternoon. These cocktail parties are a great way to meet other Burners.
For 9 years SKS has provided solar power for artist project, camps, villages, and individual Burners. Will Korthof was our solar guru, expert and advocate.
Will sadly passed away in October of 2014 and our solar work in the future remain undefined as of right now.
Events: Late afternoon Snow Koans from Mon - Sat. Come by, grab a cone, enjoy some music.
Link: http://www.snowkoansolar.org/

Description: SNAP stands for Silly Nerdy Activities Playground, and is just that.. a socializing playground and a cafe from 10am -1pm with a charging station! We will have public, shaded hang out lounge with games of all sizes. We hope to bring fun to the Playa in a lo key and help your morning start right with coffee, tea, and iced water (hopefully Iced coffee and tea too!) We also want to provide a game zone that allows everyone to socialize while playing games of all difference sizes, including a giant: Connect 4 & Battleship! Come by for cafe or any time to play a game!
Events: The cafe will be open from 10am-1pm Saturday- Saturday (hopefully Sunday too). I know there are a few planning Yoga not sure when. I know we are planning a few others.

Description: P3 Oasis is a highly interactive bar camp that exists to help you take a step to the left of your comfort zone. The bar itself is a fine design of engineering brilliance by ex-DPW, and boasts a wraparound upper deck for BRC viewing, and front row seats to the shenanigans below. Inside is a full bar, 2 dance poles, and some of the silliest, snarkiest, and sweetest peeps you'll meet on plays. Bring your own cup, a sharp wit, a penchant for the playful and ROLL THE DICE BITCHES! 
Events: Open when we wanna be.Closed when the booze runs out for the day. <3

Heart Tribe's element is the body, Camp Mystic's is the mind, and Chakralicious Camp's is the spirit. As a village we offer a diversity of highly interactive and educational workshops gatherings dance parties art exhibits healing sessions performances and speakers.

properties.name: Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 2:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge will feature craft beers from the Cascadian range on the west coast of North America. Starting in the western Canadian province of British Columbia and stretching south through Washington to Oregon, the Cascadian range is home to a wide variety of successful craft breweries which produce beers that can be found world wide. Known for their custom of innovation and creativity, craft breweries are small, independent operations which endeavor to think outside the box of traditional beer marketing to create memorable and delicious beers.The Canadian Cascadian Tiki Lounge's mission is to bring and share the fruits of these labors to the dusty, arid playa, quenching the thirst of curious burners who wish to know more about this tasty tradition by offering tastings of specific types of beers daily. Our Ciceron-in-training, Nicole, will share her knowledge of the methods used to craft these beers, the types of foods best paired with them as well their history from their inception in wooden casks in the UK to the modern day beverage enjoyed everywhere today.Burners will be encouraged to sample each beer as they are discussed and participate in a Q&A about the style of each beer as well as the various hops and the flavors they bring to each brew. Our hope is that by exposing more people to quality craft beers that we can begin to change their views on the beverage and encourage them to move out of the flavorless rut that is big brewery domestic beer.
Events: Tastings Tues, Thursday, Friday from 3-5pm  Beats nightly!

Address:
Location: 2:10 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The goals of Chakralicious Camp are to offer a variety of workshops, presentations, bands, and DJs, and take people on a rite of passage through the 7 chakras. Our philosophy is that the chakras are the seven centres of spiritual energy in the human body, and when all of the chakras are aligned, we can experience full power and transcendence as a whole community. With our decor, classes, altars and educational offerings, we wish to give people an opportunity to go on a “chakra tour” and dive deeper into their own creative potential.

properties.name: Ignited States Ski Patrol
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Dare to enter the Ignite Your State Ski Lodge for a ski shot, and spin the Wheel of Drinkers Fortune. Whiskey or water or something in between, only the Wheel of Drinkers Fortune knows. Hang out in the shade of the dome and play cards or board games, take your insults from the Bearded Lady (if she's awake), and then take a few short steps to the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Tent or the Front Porch.

At the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Tent, players will * Try to win at Scrotisserie - our version of ring toss                                                                              * Play Boob Darts                                                    * Have their fortune told                                        * Take their chances in the kissing booth          * Match wits against others in the Super Fight Card Game                                                                * Hit - or miss - a target playing Ski Pole Archery                                                                         * And yes, there's more
Had enough? Relax in the shade on our Front Porch, get spritzed with one of our special misters, and hang out with the Ski Patrollers for a while.
Events: Open daily at various times between noon and dusk
It wouldn't be Ignited States without our annual birthday party! Everyone who has a birthday in 2015 is invited to celebrate with Birthday Girl on Saturday at 4:00! Birthday Girl has an extra special birthday this year, and the best rendition of ""When I'm 64"" will win a very special prize!
Link:

properties.name: Spirit Dream
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: 12 means established. 12 years of coming home to the playa. 12 years of spirit interaction, mothering, fathering, blessing, elevating, sowing, reaping, laughing, and sharing. Spirit Dream is our home, where our heart is and we hope you will join us. Stop by and we'll fill your water, stay a bit and enjoy our expresso, a while longer and you will start to transform. Feel the strength bubbling up from the land and the refreshing rain falling from above. We will look to see your original design and embrace it with you. We will speak life to that which was lost and bring healing to that which was broken. We come to the playa to see you, to meet you, to embrace you, and to release you into something far greater. Come and let us serve you and your purpose on the Earth. We can't wait to see you...

Village: Black Rock French Quarter
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Producers of the first and only wine grown pressed and aged entirely in Black Rock City! Established in 1999 the vineyards have nurtured a cutting of the nearly extinct carnivorous Cabernet Dionaea for 12 years to yield the acclaimed Vinum Pejorative - vintners and wine lovers stop by for a sip! We especially need experts and trainees to start our first batch of Dandelion and Lilac wines!

And while you're here why not join us for a tasting? And if you have construction skills our excavation crew always needs hand.

properties.name: Camp Mystic
properties.description:
Village: Honeysuckle Hood Village
Sector: 2
Address:
Location: 2:00 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Camp Mystic is a highly interactive theme camp with a 15+ year history at burning man. We showcase visionary art installations, music and performance, and a day time series of evolutionary speakers and workshops.          VISIONARY ART: One of the things Camp Mystic has become most proud of is our showcase of incredible visionary art and performance from artists like Android Jones, Joma Sipes, Phadroid, Susan Boulet, Michael Divine, Hans Walor, Damien Jones, along with many more.MUSIC & DANCE: Camp Mystic brings together acoustic and live musical performances with some of burning man’s best artists on our famous Wednesday night party including Phutureprimitive, Random Rab, Human Experience, Desert Dwellers, Dixon's Violin, Alia, Nimitae, Kryston Pixston, and many others.                                                                       WORKSHOPS & SPEAKERS: The Mystics attract well known thought leaders, authors, speakers and teachers who offer their wisdom to the playa on topics ranging from human development, sexuality, relationship, post modern spirituality, the burning man ethos, feminine leadership, regenerative societies, emerging civilization and more.
Events: Exploring the New Story of Humanity's Evolution Speaker & Workshop Series: 1:00pm - 7:00pm Tuesday - Friday in both the Main Mystic Theater and our Healing Dome.
Link: http://www.campmystic.org

properties.name: VICE - Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience returns for its 15th! year of serving refreshing, hand-brewed, individually French-dripped, sweetened Vietnamese Iced Coffee to the caffeine-starved participants of Black Rock City.   We'll have a 20’x24’ lounge/café space and 20’x12’ coffee service structure. 
Events: We will serve VIC from 2pm to 4+pm (always a welcome respite from the early afternoon sun/dust) as well as a spontaneous service or two during the week that can happen at any time. There are interactive games to enjoy while waiting for coffee. We have additional scheduled activities including a return of our very popular Beard Spa and a night-time flagging (silk poi) workshop under black lights. Pearler beading and stilt walking are returning this year. Other possibilities are still being considered as our creative camp participants finalize plans for 2015. 
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/11110756

properties.name: Mystic Midway
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: MYSTIC MIDWAY is a community of artists, technologists, game designers, performers and cultural visionaries dedicated to creating deeply engaging, entertaining and meaningful social spaces.
This year, we bring the MYSTICAL MIDWAY, Carnival of Mythic Possibility to Burning Man's Carnival of Mirrors Midway at the base of the Man (3:00 side).
Inspired by an abundance of community spirit and social artistry he first witnessed at Burning Man in 1996, project director Scott Levkoff (aka The Professor) set out on a 20-year mission to study what made these marvelous social experiences possible.
The Mystical Midway is the latest and most ambitious incarnation of the Professor's ongoing mission.
By appearing at Burning Man this year, the Professor's ensemble invites the very community that was a major source of its inspiration to join us in stepping onto the Mythic Stage of Carnival of Mirrors and together, create wildly playful, deeply meaningful and truly unforgettable experiences.
Events: Tea party at 6PM each evening, all are welcome!Take a look at the cosplay guide on our web site for costume ideas if you are so inclined!
Link: http://www.mysticmidway.com/





https://youtube.com/watch?v=c6W5WO7isek

Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Black Rock City's Playa Theater since 1998! Nightly video screenings on our two big screens. Body painting every afternoon in our shade structure. Come by and cool off in our mister! Play with our smoke ring cannons and over-sized games. Adult Hoppity Hop races every afternoon in our courtyard! Record a message in our Burning Man video comment booth then watch it later on our screens. Play Playa Jeopardy on Wednesday night. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday night! Home of The 48 Hour Film Project BRC. Contact us if you have an original video you'd like to show.

properties.Description: Where art music and mythology intersect in Black Rock City to celebrate Burning Man. Inspired by great balls of fire candy cane stripper poles and rainbow glitter this one of a kind land-yacht is as unique as the phenomenon that inspired it. On the playa Charlie The Unicorn Art Car is known for epic DJ sets, mesmerizing laser light shows, and massive fire balls that shoot from his horn.

properties.name: Miso Horny
properties.description:
Village: Sparkle Donkey Village
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Miso Horny is all about refining ourselves and each other. We value humor communication, playfulness, open mindedness, and creating strong meaningful bonds between one another. On the Playa we gift hot miso soup, sake, and herbal aphrodisiacs, as well as engaging conversations with our guests. There are camps at Burning Man that offer public spaces for sexual play and exploration. While we fully support those groups we choose to instead explore sex positivism by creating a safe event space for healthy dialogue of human sexuality. Our mission is to share ideas and philosophies that aid in the discovery of our sexual selves. We have created, and are always improving, a dedicated workshop and event space that is a platform for our lifelong journey of learning.
Events:
Link: http://misohorny.us

Description: Raised By Wolves is a transcontinental pack of artists, healers, performers, and builders who are inspired and impassioned by the classic story of feral children and their wolf pack families. Each year we bring our untamed energy to the Black Rock desert through play, performance and art. Our gifts this year include our Cafe, where you can get hot locally-roasted coffee every morning, and Ziza the Roving Tea Truck. We will also be hosting a speaker series each day, with a lecture followed by a more interactive workshop.

properties.name: Spanky's Wine Bar
properties.description:
Village: Spanky's Village
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:55 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Spanky's is the infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars. We are an interactive group of theme camps focused around our Wine Bar. This year, we are home to The Camp for Sensual Pleasures, Illumelodie and their Eros Tangeré Erotic Sensation Performance , Camp Stupid, Hello Camp, Mischievous Ambitions, The Buffer Zone, Body Painting, Camp Lola and so much more, along with a portion of The Burning Band. And new this year... Spanky's Carnival Midway! Spanky's is also the host of myriad events and activities, including (but not limited to); classes and demonstrations, MPR (Morning Painjoy Radio), many great DJs, The LBD (little black dress parade), The Festival of Bubastis, Spank-dat-Bootie, and The Post-Temple Wine-Down Party. Spanky's is also home to an amazing array of toys, such as the Spank-o-Matic machine, the Latex Vac-u-Bed, the Orgasamator and other adult-themed toys.! And on the air, Radio Free Spanky’s – 100.5 FM.
Events: Click here: :http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=%22Spanky%27s+Wine+Bar%22

properties.name: Hanging Gardens
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Hanging Gardens is an all-inclusive space - male, female, gay and straight - that celebrates the beauty of our interconnectedness through our three pillars of EDUCATION, RESTORATION and GROWTH. Visiting The Hanging Gardens means opening yourself up to the possibilities of chance meetings and unexpected playa adventures. HG will create a lush garden in the desert, complete with hammocks, plant life, cool shade, trees, vines and more, The Garden will host weary wanderers from all corners of the Playa with opportunities to learn together, heal together and foster growth both as individuals and as group. Come, relax and make a new friend, meet a family member you never knew you had or find the love of your life. The possibilities are endless; the connections, limitless.
Events: The 1st Annual BRC Gateway Garden Party! Join the Hanging Gardens for it's first ever Gateway Garden Party! First time on the playa? Seasoned Burner looking for an adventure with a new friend? The Gardeners are excited to invite you to our desert oasis to meet your neighbors and play our mysterious adventure game! We want to be your gateway to the playa! So come, hang out in the Garden, pair up with a stranger and find out what random adventure awaits! (Examples: "Have a lovely romantic walk along the esplanade until you find free food" or "Save the Man from the invading Aliens by neutralizing anyone wearing neon … here's your pew pew gun!”). Music, drinks and general revelry to ensue!Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Fly! Bring a friend to our garden, or come make a new one in this acro yoga playshop. To fly and be flown is a gift unlike any other, and a joyful opportunity to connect ever deeper with yourself and others. We will explore several basic mounts for the beginning flyer, and a few intermediate positions for those eager to take major lift-off. Yoga warm up, thai massage, and live music will be a feature of this class. No experience necessary. Bring a mat and a smile :) - Taught by Yoga Instructor Rocky Heron Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 noon – 1:30 p.m.
Just Breathe! Come to the Hanging Gardens for a magical breathing circle and guided meditation by our camp Shaman. This will be a fun, heart-opening experience set to music that will facilitate much joy, laughter and rejuvenation. No meditation experience needed. Powerful natural high guaranteed! - Taught by Energy Therapist Joshua Farahnik Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Playacology Come join our camp scientist as he leads a fascinating discussion on the evolution, history and geology of the playa. Afterwards, we will go on a late night walk to observe some stars for a mini astronomy lesson. - Taught by Scientist James Dowd Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Decompression Detox Come to the gardens and join our Shaman for an informative one-hour lecture on how to restore and heal the body naturally using herbs and supplements. After this incredible week of extremes, you can use these tools to adapt back into the default world, lessen decompression time, and keep your physical and emotional bodies operating at their fullest. Or if you're struggling and need a second wind to get through this last weekend, learn some tips and try some herbal remedies that will give you new life! - Taught by Clinical Herbalist Joshua Farahnik Friday, September 4th, 2015 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Nourish! Come to our garden and water your seeds of ease and well-being through this yoga practice of restorative postures, pranayama (breath work) and mediation. Live acoustic music and mantra will accompany this deeply rejuvenating session designed to replenish your energy and soak your roots. Take time to care for yourself in the garden, that you may have even more to share and offer to this magical city we call home. Bring a mat and towel (if you have them). - Taught by Yoga Instructor Rocky Heron Friday, September 4th, 2015 4 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Link: http://www.facebook.com/hanginggardensbrc
properties.Description: The Hanging Gardens is an all-inclusive space - male, female, gay and straight - that celebrates the beauty of our interconnectedness through our three pillars of EDUCATION, RESTORATION and GROWTH. properties.name: NuTz Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 10
Address:
Location: 10:00 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Nutz family is dedicated to sharing love and joy and positive vibes with all that cross our path. We call up on the healing powers of music, namely break beats and house, to further our efforts to open hearts, create joy, form meaningful friendships and promote peace within our immediate community and the world beyond. Over the ten years of its existence, the Nutz Camp is proud to have become known as a safe-haven for fun, silliness and acceptance in our community.   
Come feel the Nutz Love at one of our legendary sunrise parties. Located at 10:00 & H we offer unobstructed views of the sunrise, happy vibes and some of the most beautiful sunrise sets to ever grace the playa!
Events: SUNRISE PARTIES
WEDNESDAY- FRIENDS OF NUTZTHURSDAY- KRAMER (DISTRIKT)FRIDAY- ANNUAL SHACK SUNRISE SET!

properties.name: Academy of Arts & Sciences
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Our camp is focused on the intersection of Art and Science. We have an eclectic group, with some hardcore science types with awesome art instincts (like a real live aerospace engineer that does body painting) and some amazing art types that love science. This year, we will have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners’ diverse tastes.We will be providing a wide range of activities on the playa. This year we are able to add night time activities in addition to our day time events. Some activities include:· Bismuth crystal making · Triple pendulums, separate Night and Day versions! See the prototype here! http://www.flickr.com/photos/mrscience/8654430636 · Harmonograph · Measurement of the earth’s procession · GPS trackering – wondering where you were last night? · Pneumatic can crusher- hours of fun creating ammo · Tasty beverage density columns · A veritable crap-ton of optical gadgets and more! We will have a complete listing in Who/What/Where plus a reader board in camp with details of the subjects and times. The list above are the activities we already have planned and built (where building is required). In addition to our daily activities, we generally strive to have a few impromptu events, such as last year’s Bacon and Socks on Thursday morning. Frankly, we were surprised how many people on the playa needed socks, and it was yet another opportunity to meet new people.The Bad Idea Bar will continue to operate throughout the week providing refreshing beverages upon request. Give us a bad idea and we’ll give you a bad drink. Bad ideas are listed and derogatory comments made throughout the week. At the end we have the community choose the best of the worst ideas, then celebrate the winners and losers with more bad drinks. The bar is always op en when we are around and you are of age.Feeling up for a view? Come inspect the playa and the friendliest neighborhood at Black Rock from our viewing platform. We are happy to share our view as it gives us a chance to learn a little more about you. Finally, and most important during the day, you want shade? We’ve got shade. Over 800 square feet of cool goodness with comfy seating and a filled ice jug are always available. Sit down and relax, get to know us a little better (and vice versa) and decide if you’d like to learn a bit more about the intersection of science and art.

properties.name: The Phage
properties.description:
Village: The Institute Village
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 5:15 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations, they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads - the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.
Events:
Link: http://thephage.org/

Description: Don’t be a Boar all by yourself, come play with the Pigmalions! We’ve been hosting our famous daytime party on the Playa for well over a decade. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas. All vegetarians are welcomed (to be converted) at our event. Get your trotters tapping with DJ Julio playing some of the best (and obscure) disco you’ll ever hear. It kicks off around 11-ish in the morning. Just bring a cup and a smile. It’ll be sooey-eet.
Events: Saturday, Monday, Wednesday, and Friday: 11 AM-ish to 1 PM-ish

properties.name: Astropups
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 6:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Since 2001, the Astropups have been known for providing a cool (and furry) oasis on the playa where countless queer (and just queer-friendly) Burners have crossed paths and met new friends. The Astropups camp has always been hub of daytime and nighttime activity, whether it's one of our many queer proms, scavenger hunts, wrestling tournaments, cocktail mixers, tantric workshops, project runway-type competitions or crafternoons. 
Aside from our activities, the Astropups have been known for taking in wayward strays on a hot afternoon, either in a lively conversation in our public living room, or crashing in a restful snooze in our fun-fur lined playpen/chill space.
The Astropups camp has traditionally acted as a "front-porch" camp for the 'Gayborhood'. 'Gayborhood' camps regularly schedule joint activities to celebrate our joy on the playa.
Events:
Link: http://www.astropups.com/

properties.name: Millionaire Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:45 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Burning Man desert - a dry, arid place bereft of technology, culture, and clothing. We've been coming to burning man for many years seeking new business connections, new investment opportunities, and sophisticated relaxation with others of our social class.

Millionaire Camp is a camp dedicated to meeting founders for monetary benefit, targeted promotional advertising, and bringing creature comforts for our esteemed guests without the hassle of having to organize them yourself.

For the past several years, we've operated from K street, and are thrilled that the Burning Man Org has recognized our significant contributions to the event, and placed on Esplanade and 3:45 this year!

In exchange for this honor, we've decided to allow more public access to our camp than in years prior. Instead of surrounding the camp with RVs, we've decided to scale back security to wristband access which can be obtained at the event upon approval of your millionaire status. Additionally, we are hosting 2 public events this year where anyone is welcome regardless of social status - our Cristal Happy Hour, and ShART Tank (though a small cover charge will be assessed). Ample Segway parking will be available out front, and any servants, companions, or assistants can spend their time with the rest of the interesting Illumination Village artists while you engage in your business.

Unfortunately, we are sold out of camping positions this year. Please ask to get on our list for application to the camp next year, and secure your early bird dues rate of $17,000. However, we are still looking for a few people interested in running the mechanics of the camp in exchange for a discounted rate for wristband access. Please enquire if interested.

We look forward to meeting you there at some point during the week!
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/millionairecamp

Description: Clusterf*ck United exists to celebrate all that Burning Man has to offer while providing a safe, supportive and friendly home on the Playa. Honoring our differences while embracing our similarities, welcoming newbies and those with experience, our camp is what Burning Man is, a Clusterf*ck while united.
Events: "Private Party
Day: Tuesday
Time: 9-11 PM
Description: VIP only. Dress to impress. Bottle service available. Valet parking. Are you on the guestlist? ID please. Free before 10 (and after).

Mask Charade
Day: Wednesday
Time: 8-10 PM
Description: Is my face a mirror of what’s inside? Do I have the freedom to wear another? Join us for a mysterious ball. Don’t forget your mask!

Hip Hop Anonymous
Day: Thursday
Time: 2-4 PM
Description: No names, just sick dance moves. Laying the freshest beats on the 1s and 2s. Come thirsty and ready to get ill with us on the dance floor."

properties.name: BRC Museum of Science Industry and Technology
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Carny, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The BRC Museum of Industry, Science and Technology (MoIST) pays tribute to both the real and fake people behind all the amazing inventions that make BRC and Burning Man possible. In addition to a traveling exhibition of the BRC Museum of Transportation History (which you may remember from Burning Mans 2013 and 2014), MoIST tells the stories of the brilliant, enterprising, or just plain lucky folks who brought us things like the hydration pack, rebar, the porta-potty, EL wire, the zip tie, and so many more. And don't miss the museum's bar: the MoIST-Tang Ranch. At the bar will be served... moist Tang. Patrons may decide how moist they want their Tang.
Events:
Link:
properties.Description: The BRC Museum of Industry, Science and Technology (MoIST) pays tribute to both the real and fake people behind all the amazing inventions that make BRC and Burning Man possible. In addition to a traveling exhibition of the BRC Museum of Transportation History (which you may remember from Burning Mans 2013 and 2014), MoIST tells the stories of the brilliant, enterprising, or just plain lucky folks who brought us things like the hydration pack, rebar, the porta-potty, EL wire, the zip tie, and so many more. And don't miss the museum's bar: the MoIST-Tang Ranch. At the bar will be served... moist Tang. Patrons may decide how moist they want their Tang.

properties.name: Camp Afterglow
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Afterglow: that wonderful feeling that lingers long after the experience has elapsed -- a feeling that only occurs when the mind, body, and soul has been ever so stimulated. Our gift to the Playa and to its dear citizens is Afterglow!
Events: Mobility and Rebalancing Workshop Realign from head to toe going through each joint and section in the body. The intention is to explore and play. To step out of our comfort zones and to connect deeper.
Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

Tea Time with Performance by John Craigie
Tuesday, September 1st, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.

Capoeira Capoeira: Capoeira is an Afro-Brazilian art form that combines martial arts, music and dance. The workshop will explore some of the basic movements and how they fit together to create a dialogue between players. Come play!
Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

Socially Awkward 101: Take an amusing journey into the world of the socially awkward. Learn how it manifests and discover all it has to offer.
Wednesday, September 2nd, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Yoga: Ashtanga/Hatha Rough night? Come get re-centered and balanced with some morning yoga.
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.

BYOUke Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop. Learn a thing or two...or three about rhythm, harmony, and melody on this wonderful little instrument!
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Tea Time Tea Time with Performances by John Nash & The One Night Wonder
Thursday, September 3rd, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.

House Dance Workshop: We will dance and play with different rhythms and patterns in the body.
Friday, September 4th, 2015 11 a.m. – noon

I2M Contact Improv: Interactive improvisation is what we do in life every day: driving, meeting people, working together. When it comes to dancing we have so many opportunities to interact in ways that we don't always give ourselves permission to do. In our time together we will look at options for moving together, playfully, respectfully and with calculated risk.
Friday, September 4th, 2015 noon – 1 p.m.

Mad Hatter's Tea Party: Enter the psychedelic world of the Mad Hatters Tea Party for complete unity with the cosmos. For every hat there's a different expression of the universe, for every expression there's a different impression left. No matter how long you stay- the experience stays with you longer… welcome to Afterglow. Bring your Mad Hat!!
Saturday, September 5th, 2015 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Link:

properties.name: Covered in Bees
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:00 & Esplanade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Covered in Bees Offers a bee-themed Hive Lounge and Bar featuring home-brewed honey beers and whiskey infusions. Our incredible 1500 LED lighting covers our dome in an interactive fashion utilizing Microsoft Connect allowing visitors to manipulate the mood and patterns. Out front is our returning fire spinning space & burn barrel for fire comfort! The chill / lounge space includes a hookah bar. We support and promote bee awareness helping educate the public to the plight of colony collapse and similar issues while promoting bee keeping legislation. Our camp also hosts the Bombus Regius art car (pending DMV approval !)

properties.name: dEOxidized
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:00 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: dEOxidized Camp is dedicated to recharging the batteries of all hard working burners. The camp is comprised of members of an Entrepreneurs Organization along with guests from all over the world. Together we will co-create an unforgettable experience with our community of friends, old and new. Our main attraction will be a 50' parachute featuring a lounge-type chill space with an open bar, live music, and happy hour everyday from 3 to Sunset. There will also be a stage for impromptu performance, educational talks, and well planned workshops throughout the day: ie, Yoga, bicycle workshops. We have members from all over the United States and as far as Dubai, New Zealand, and Mexico. We are a diverse group of burners with much to share and look forward to meeting you!
Events:
Link: http://www.deoxidized.org

Description: Stop by Desert Chai-Wallah to hang out in our Lotus lounge tents (look for the tents that look like giant onions). As the day starts to cool down, we'll serve authentic Indian-style masala chai in in the early evenings from camp. Later in the evening, we'll bike out the remainder with our LED-lit bright orange chai cart to serve chai in various locations around the playa. ☕️✨
Events: 6-8pm Monday-Saturday - serving Chai from camp!

6-8pm Tuesday & Thursday - improv games at camp

9pm - ?? Out in the desert, serving chai from our mobile chai cart. Look for the LED CHAI sign!

Later in the evening, we'll bike out the remainder with our LED-lit bright orange chai cart to serve chai in various locations around the playa. ☕️✨
properties.Events:
6-8pm Monday-Saturday - serving Chai from camp!

6-8pm Tuesday & Thursday - improv games at camp

9pm - ?? Out in the desert, serving chai from our mobile chai cart. Look for the LED CHAI sign!

An East meets West Saloon-of Sorts; combining the spices, silks, and teas of the east, with the spurs, saloons, whiskeys, and wagon trains of the west. Cowboy hats meet Saris. Tea ceremonies meets tumbleweeds. Banjos meet Sitars. Where one sun sets, the other rises!

We are a gender conscious, open, loving community that loves sparkles theatrics drag running anti-oppression workshops and making queer smoothies on playa.

properties.name: Gymnasium
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 Portal, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We want to recreate the atmosphere of the Gymnasium in its original, Ancient Greek meaning, as a facility for training and competition in public games, as well a place for socializing and engaging in intellectual pursuits. The term originates from the word [gymnós] meaning “naked”, because historically in Ancient Greece one exercised naked, and we would like to revive this aspect too, as we think that by doing athletic and fun activities naked, participants will experience bonding aspect of such events stronger.
Events:
Link: http://activenaturists.net/burning-man-2015/

properties.name: Naked Rainbow
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: "Welcome to Naked Rainbow, the Strip Club for your Soul. Expose your dreams. Flash your fears. Bend over, spread your cheeks and give us a bare-assed view of your inner self. Our safe, open, meaningful and interactive environment plies you with mimosas, Harry Potter cocktails and good conversations to get you naked — spiritually naked, that is. Share your aspirations on the Tree of Dreams. Unburden your woes on the Tree of Prayers. Take a quiet moment out of your day to pray or meditate. Align your mind and spirit with Mimosa Vinyasa (Wed 5-6PM BYOM). Connect to each other at our modern partner-dancing workshops in costume (Tutu Tuesday 4:30-6PM + Bunny Thursday 3-4:30PM)! Join us for our Harry Potter cocktail hour dressed in your favorite house or color of the rainbow (Friday 5-7PM BYOC, starting with Andy’s standup routine)! We dare you to come sit in the Bad Advice Chair. You may even find yourself in the middle of an impromptu flow jam or fire spinning session. Even if it’s something as simple as dancing to our live beats or relaxing in the shade of our visually stimulating Dome, we hope you leave the Naked Rainbow with the most vibrant hues of your soul revealed.

Hometown: Los Angeles + San Francisco"
Events:
Link:

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:30 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Ever wonder what's in playa dust? The special formula is just right for some solar glass making. Grab a pair of our welding goggles and we'll set you up at a Fresnel lens station where you'll raise the temperature of the dust to over 1000F and melt it in to black glass. Turn it in to a wearable pendant at the craft table and you'll have an easier-than-a-bag-of-dust way to take the playa back to the default world.
Events:
Link: http://capeandislands.org/post/breaking-down-dust

properties.name: Shots for Shocks
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 & Freak Show, Black Rock City, NV
Description: We are a kinky electro-bar with a focus on consent, new experiences, and shenanigans! You can find us at 7:30 and Freakshow. Whether you're into electrical play, cigars, or puppies and ponies, we've got a little something for everyone.
Events: "Bad Idea Bingo
Mon - Sat, All Day!
Pick up a bingo card from ""Shots for Shocks!"", perform a variety of ""bad ideas"" at neighborhood camps and bring your card back for a prize!

Shocktails and Zappy Hour!
Mon - Sat, 12pm - 4pm
Have an electrifying experience at ""Shots for Shocks!"" Let us zap you with a cattle prod and we'll reward you with a delicious hand-infused shot for your bravery. We'll also have the Invisible Maze for those who are feeling extra brave, and the delights and horrors of Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Vodka Roulette! Bring ID, 18+ for shocks and play, 21+ for alcohol.

Sculpt Your Cock
Tues, 12pm - 4pm
Do you have a prize cock that is a work of art and should be on display? Get your penis cast and turned in to a sculpture by artist Lily Priest. All penises: sizes, shapes should be celebrated. Needed: hard cocks and fluffers. Participants only. 18+, bring ID.
This event will NOT be in the physical WWW book. Make a note of it now!

Polyamory 101 for Singles, Secondaries, and Solos
Tues, 5pm - 6:30pm
Interested in non-monogamy, but think it's just for couples ""opening up""? Let's talk about entering the scene single, taking care of your heart, and creating the relationships that are best for YOU! With Seattle instructor and sex positive activist Rose Riley.

Pet Play Mosh!
Tues, 7pm - 9pm
Pony? Puppy? Kitty? Unicorn? Hedgehog? All you crazy critters are welcome to come mosh! This is an open meet and greet and play event for pets, handlers, and people who are curious about pet play in general! 18+, bring ID
This event will NOT be in the physical WWW book. Make a note of it now!

Sensual Pleasures Cigar Lounge
Wed, 5pm - 8pm
Indulge ALL your vices at this sex positive cigar meet-up, hosted by ""Shots for Shocks!"" Come hang out in our luscious lounge and smoke the afternoon away with fellow fetishists. We'll have plenty of supplies and a few cigars to share, but bring favorites, scotch, and BYO human ashtray! 18+, bring ID

Kinky Life Drawing!
Thurs, 5pm - 8pm
""Shots for Shocks!"" gets artistic! Bring your sketch pads and get ready to sketch things your art teacher never taught you about! We'll provide hard lemonade and some supplies. Models, riggers, etc, VERY welcome. 18+, bring ID

Shocks for Scotch w/ Shots for Shocks!
Thurs, 8pm - 11pm
Electro-scotch at ""Shots for Shocks!"" Brave the cattle prod to earn entry into our fancy whiskey tasting, or to indulge in an Old Fashioned. Or bring your own and just come to relax in our luxurious lounge. Cigars and shenanigans also on tap! Bring ID, 18+ for shocks and play, 21+ for booze."
Link: http://playaevents.burningman.org/playa_event/search/2015/?search=shots+for+shocks

Address:
Location: 3:00 Plaza, Black Rock City, NV
Description: SIDESHOW! Carnival of Smoke and Mirrors. Looky looky! It's all on the inside! Sideshow brings you a traditional old time sideshow experience with a decidedly BM twist. See the strange and the weird... marvel at exclusive exhibits in the Odditorium of Playa Wonders, and gasp in awe at astounding magic performances by masters of the craft. Put yourself in the show and be a freak of nature, or test your wits at games of skill. Daily performances at 1 pm, Monday through Saturday, and late night magic performances too! Check the WWW Guide for times and details!

properties.name: Camp Soft Landing
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Camp Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, hydrate, rest, tell stories, and participate in workshops. Soft Landing sponsors and staffs the Full Circle Tea House, which is planning to return to the playa for the 5th year to offer fine pu'erh tea and herbal infusions in the Chinese Gung Fu tradition. Servers provide tea and empathy, and comfortable spaces for rest, hydration, and quiet conversation 24 hours a day. The Full Circle Tea House will be hosting a satellite Zendo in our camp this year. The Zendo project is coordinated by volunteers organized and trained by the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS). Soft Landing also presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring 40 visionary talks and stories spanning concepts such as technology, medicine, art, science, design, and entheobotany. These events take place in the Palenque Norte circus tent which also hosts small musical performances and yoga.
Events:
Link: http://www.campsoftlanding.com

Description: We invite you to enjoy Summer Camp as an adult while still letting your inner child play! Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: the Ring Toss Drinking Game, 8-Bit scavenger hunt adventure, climbing up our two story Thirst Aid Tree House Bar, dream interpretation, painting on our art wall, playing spin the giant bottle, yoga, meditation, improv jam, poetry, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, giant marshmallow S'Mores, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, hand misters, a comfy couch and a pillow tent, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

Description: The GREEN GODDESS invites Burning Man Participants of All Ages to join us for refreshments and reflection while nourishing your body with delightful tastes of fermented foods and beverages. Stop by for "Healthy Hour" from 2pm-5pm on Tuesday and Thursday to enjoy healthy homemade fermented refreshments while relaxing in our lounge space listening to soothing mantras and classical-infused electronic vibes, staying cool under the solar-powered water misters. Join us the Green Goddess on Monday and Wednesday morning (10:30am to Noon) for the "Fermented Goodness" workshop and learn about the benefits of probiotic foods including how to make them for yourself at home! All interested class participants will be gifted a kombucha or water kefir "starter kit" to use at home.

Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:15 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Secret Gentlemen's Club will bring culture and refinement to this savage land. The Secret Gentlemen's Club is a space in which a person, be they commoner or king, can be the best version of themselves. The Secret Gentlemen's Club could use a stiff drink and knows how to mix it.well. The Secret Gentlemen's Club practices expert gamesmanship. The Secret Gentlemen's Club counts among its members both men and women (because of course women can be the most secret gentlemen of all). The Secret Gentlemen's Club reminds you that proper attire is required (or will be provided). The Secret Gentlemen's Club: Just Fucking Dandy

Come to TuTu camp on Tuesday and Tullesday and indulge your clothing-making passion. Frolic in our Tulle-rest any time; enjoy its gauzy breeze and improvised trees.

Description: The Steam Bath Project makes the mundane magical! The simple act of "cleansing" becomes part of an age-old ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation. We invite you into the geodesic dome where you can relax on the wooden benches as boiling water produces steam with negative ions that fill the space. Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.

properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:00 Plaza, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Dreamaginatorium aims to foster a sense of wonder joy and excitement. We create a space and energy of play exploration and creativity that helps people get in touch with their deepest dreams, hopes, and desires, and inspires them to follow their heart and pursue these dreams. We do this primarily through sublime art and participatory improvisational performance that induces heart and mind, opening experiences to remind people of the magic all around them and inside themselves.
Events: "Wednesday & Thursday 6-8pm: Skitzophreniation
Join us for a 15m interactive audio experience. We provide a radio with headphones and an audio track guiding you how to interact – alone, with others, and with your surroundings. It’s wacky, wild and social. You may not know what’s going on, but you’ll have fun figuring it out!

You can also feel free to stop by another time to hang out, and if we're available, we'll set it up for you and up to 24 friends."
Link: http://dreamaginatorium.com

properties.name: School of Safe Sex
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:30 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The School of Safe Sex provides an inviting, casual, relaxing, judgment free, environment for guests from all corners of the globe and all walks of life to come together for an amazing burn. This is our way to unite the community through a positive and educational experience involving love and sensuality regardless of gender or sexual preferences.
We will have 800 square feet of shaded space for rest and relaxation in addition to a school yard with activities for our fellow burners to utilize 24/7.
We will offer interactive classes in the shaded school space where our fellow burners can discuss various sexual topics, ideas and fantasies. Though a class instructor will be provided each day, we can all learn from one another so class participation is strongly encouraged. We look forward to teaching, learning, loving, valuing and believing in others and ourselves all while having a sexy good time! We encourage everyone to arrive on time so that the classes can begin on schedule. It will also allow all those that wish to attend the opportunity to get a class snack and be entered for the chance to spin the prize wheel; there will be 15 prizes given out daily. The prizes will be an assortment of quality sex toys and hygiene kits.
We will have condom dispensers at the school and on the school buses where fellow burners can take condoms as needed throughout the week. This is our way to help Black Rock City stay safe and sex positive.
We will have two 1920's style mutoscopes at the school and two at center camp. These mutoscopes will have a variety of tasteful yet sultry and fun adult movies. The movies will be changed daily so we encourage everyone to stop by and checkout the new flicks of the day.
Events: 1 PM daily class on sexually related topics. 24 hour relaxing atmosphere, games, playground equipment. Each class participant will receive a handmade, numbered, School of Safe Sex necklace and a class time snack. We will use the numbers on the back of each necklace for our random drawing to see who gets to spin the prize wheel at the end of each class. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a prize!! All prizes are brand new and of awesome quality! The following pictures are of the exact prizes that will be given away. We will also be handing out, by various means, nifty hygiene kits. These kits are great if you forgot to bring something with you to the playa or have run out of something. We are all about keeping our fellow burners happy and healthy!
Link: http://www.schoolofsafesex.org

properties.name: PlayGround Experience
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 2
Address:
Location: 2:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: PlayGround is an entertainment entity set up to foster community, adventure and play. We create spaces to explore and reconnect with the inner you. 
Body Pain-Ting: No one ever said making art was easy, which is why we have brought the ultimate body painting experience to the Playa. We'll use plethora of instruments to spank you with finest colours. This puts the Pain into Body Painting. Come as you dare!
Lala's Hugs 'N' Rubs: Weary adventurers, come in for a refreshing mint tea and either a 15 minute rub (massage) or hug. Choose from a menu of 5/6 options of each. Rubs include Eargasm Rub, Playa Head Hold, Shape Shifting Shoulder Rub. Hugs include Playa Sunshine Hug, Uncomfortable English Hug and Kiss and a bunch of others. Don't forget our speciality: the Creepy Hug!
Human Foosball! We are the champions, and we know it! Foosball, Football, Soccer? Whatever you want to call it, roll up with your camp mates, and step on the pitch. We've got your foosball fix, right here! This is tournament standard fun. Sign up for a session with six other camp mates, and we'll add you to our tournament. You could also challenge a fellow camp to try our their football skills - no prisoners will be taken.
Events: Body Pain-Ting:Wednesday, September 2nd, 1–4pm / Thursday, September 3rd, 1–4pm / Friday, September 4th, 1–4pm.
LaLa's Hugs 'N' Rubs Wednesday, September 2nd, 4–6pm Thursday, September 3rd, 4–6pm / Friday, September 4th, 4–6pm. 
Human Foosball Tournament Wednesday, September 2nd, noon–4pm / Thursday, September 3rd, noon–4pm / Friday, September 4th, noon–4pm.

Join us for discussions about finding meaning (Tuesday @ 3PM) and dealing with loss as an atheist/skeptic (Thursday @ 3PM).

Tue - 3pm'ish - Finding Meaning without Spirituality
Wed - 9am'ish - "Bicyclist Repair" yoga - yoga for tired biking bodies
Wed - 3pm - ish - Bike Jousting
Wed - 7pm-ish - Meditation session
Thu - 9am'ish - Cracked Out Yoga - self explanatory
Thu - 3pm'ish - Dealing with Loss as an Atheist
Fri - 9am'ish - Regular Yoga
Mimosas - Tu - Sat
Impromptu, unscheduled activities - limbo, body painting, playa marriages

properties.name: Shamandome
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:00 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Shamandome is a collective of "Shamanistas" - people interested in developing the understanding and practice of ancient healing wisdom for the good of others and ourselves. Shamanistas collaborate with Spirit and help you break through negative patterns to create a new reality by re-directing energy. We find joy, community, identity and healing in utilizing the right side of the brain through shamanic journeying, and in helping others do the same.

Our tradition does not use drugs or plant medicines, we use only drumming and rattling for journeying.

Unleash your Power Animal!
Wake up the Shaman in you!

Exercise more of your options in Life, Mind, Body, Spirit, Cosmos and Heart.
Events:
Link: http://www.shamandome.org/

properties.name: Essence
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:45 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Essence provides BRC residents with beautiful art to experience as they navigate the streets. Computer controlled lamps are hanging in the front of our camp for everyone to see, and illuminate the area. Art will be displayed on the front walls facing the street. Essence also promotes interactivity through the mediation/self-discovery/divination card desk. In the card room in the front of the camp, people can sit down and learn how to use the Essentia Card Deck to understand themselves and other people better in a very interactive way. A deck will be given to burners that would like a copy for themselves, allowing them to interact with other burners and to explore their own inner world.
Events: Daily Card Readings

properties.name: Stars, Hearts, Bunnies, and Tea Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:30 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Welcome to Stars, Hearts, Bunnies, and Tea Camp! We are villaged with Do More Now for 2015! Founded in 2012 by Temple Guardians Cuchulainn and Temple Bunny Mag Aoidh to bring traditional Chinese Gongfu Cha (工夫茶) to the Playa! With the aid of a gaiwan we serve only high end imported teas from China, Taiwan, and Japan. Our camp aspires to bring warmth, health, meditation, friendship, and good company to those whom seek the way of tea. You'll find no flavored teas, sachets, or tisanes in this camp. Only the real deal from the Camellia Sinensis in the form of loose leaf oolongs, pu-erhs, whites, greens, and blacks. Come find out what real tea is all about or find your established fix with us!

properties.name: Camp Illuminaughty
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:45 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Dance, drink, and soul grabbing illumination are what Camp Illuminaughty brings to the denizens of Black Rock City. As a veteran group of six years, our camp has learned a few things. Foremost is that we’re all nocturnal people. We live by night and sleep by day. This year we are continuing our theme as a night-oriented interactive light themed camp.

Each year our camp brings with it the Wall of Light, our mobile interactive video wall that is designed to get people up and moving to the party. The video wall responds to sound and body movements using a Kinect sensor. Each dancer appears as a silhouette, showing the contours of their figure with gradients of brightness. The wall is bright and colorful, with a low-rez style that frees dancers of their inhibitions, mesmerizing interactees and onlookers alike. The Wall of Light debuted in 2013 and drew a crowd wherever it went.

Each night we ceremoniously illuminate the camp and draw in our neighbors and fellow citizens for drinks, dance and all of the illuminated naughtiness that can be expected on the playa. We have a second stationary video wall, light sculptures and illusions, and illuminated toys for all to enjoy. Guests can whet their palettes with drinks from our bar, groove to the music or rest on our ample seating.

Link:

properties.name: Above the Limit
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:15 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Carnivals can take many forms, each seen through the complex mirrored lenses of the beholders. For some, a carnival conjures up images of rides, games, kaleidoscopic images, snow cones, cotton candy, and the smell of fresh popcorn. For others, a carnival is a festival of dazzling costumes, exotic masks, colorful lights, sounds, and textured fabrics. For still others, a parade is required. Above The Limit seeks to combine all of the above into a festival of interactivity, a time of celebration for carefree spirits seeking to make the most of their time before returning to penitence in the default world. Come grab a flaming shot at the flaming bar, a s'more by the fire, or a drink at the tiki bar!
Events:
Link: http://www.campabovethelimit.com/index.html

Events: Come sing your hearts out while we fill your cup with bubbly at our Sunset Champagne singalongs... sing along to classic tunes that have been personalized and and simplified for your comfort and convenience; Join us as we sing ""We Will, We Will Burn You"", ""Little Ditty 'bout Burnin' the Man"", ""Black Rock, Black Rock"" and ""We All Live in A Great Big Dusty Land"" etc...
It all happens at Sunset, and if the mood is light and the company's right we'll fire up the the pizza ovens and let the Disco Pizza Party commence!

properties.name: Sacred Heart Oasis Cantina
properties.description:
Village: AEZ
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:35 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Sacred Heart Oasis Margarita Bar and Cantina is an intimate and shaded space (10'x15') where you can meet and chat with Burners from all over the world while sipping a cold margarita on a hot afternoon. (No underage citizens please). We put out the chairs and turn on the solar powered blender Monday to Friday from about 4:00ish to 6:30 (or whenever we get hungry).

So go see Black Rock City all morning, eat lunch, take a nap and then come over to the AEZ/Sacred Heart Oasis Margarita Bar and Cantina for a cool crushed ice beverage. Bring a cup and let the Playa come to you in the heat of the day.

Sacred Heart Oasis Margarita Bar and Cantina, serving Black Rock City since 2002. Over 23,000 Margaritas served.

properties.name: Suntrakker Life & Career Planning
properties.description:
Village: AEZ
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:35 & Ersatz, Black Rock City, NV
Description: "Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back. Concerning all acts of initiative (and creation), there is one elementary truth, the ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would never otherwise have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in one's favor all manner of unforeseen incidents and meetings and material assistance, which no one could have dreamed would have come their way.
Whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Begin it now.”
~ W.H. Murray

Suntrakker Camp offers Life Coaching and Career Planing services to those who need it.

This is designed especially for people who know they have what it takes to succeed but at this moment, haven’t identified what to succeed at. The reality is you could do many things and be very successful at all of them. A better question might be: What activity would make you successful and HAPPY.

If you found this link and are not sure what to do with your future, come to the Sacred Heart Oasis Margarita Bar and Cantina, get a margarita and ask for Jed. 
Events: Private counseling is available fro 4:30 to 6 pm. No appointment necessary. Come with confusion, leave with a plan.

properties.name: Camp Manifestation
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 6
Address:
Location: 6:15 & Hanky Pank, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The existence of Camp Manifestation is the outcome of a number of different inquiries, processes, learnings and creations that has given rise to a beautiful community of like-minded people, sharing, building, learning, growing and evolving themselves and the camp over time. As a camp we encourage and support people to examine the process of manifestation. In so doing one can come to find that each person is unique in their expression in the world and therefore what they manifest. Who you are - what you are designed for - is the primary force that empowers you to make your ideas come to pass. By aligning oneself with that design one can thrive. Then the sharing of what one creates in the world becomes a natural expression.

The vision of the camp involves exploring ones design, the very nature of creation and the realization of that power within each of us. That power enables us to manifest whatever is in one's heart thereby allowing one to experience life as one desires. By acknowledging and honoring our very human nature, putting intention toward the coupling of the power of thought combined with the moving force of action, we begin to see and experience the merging of these two forces which allows us to create magical results in the world. 
Events:
Link: http://campmanifestation.com

Description: The end is nigh! Come bounce while you can in the upholstered luxury of our Bungee Couch Garden, sip the ambrosia of perpetual motion (champagne and 5-hour energy, the official libation of our Ultimate Celebration, available from 4-6pm daily), contemplate your own ultimate destination, wipe your filthy face with a hot towel, join in a campfire sing-along, or zip around on a Wiimote-controlled electric armchair. In short, if your vision of the apocalypse is as lazy and carefree as ours, we’ve got you covered!

properties.name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 3
Address:
Location: 3:15 & Jolly, Black Rock City, NV
Description: FCRC features several areas of interactivity: a plush, shaded lounge and bar, famously known as The Chevy Chaise Lounge, the famous Semi-Circular Driveway, allowing easy access for passing Furniture Cars (as most do not have reverse), and the infield area with an animated light fountain, "Desert Spring."
Events: On Thursday at 2pm, we will hold the largest Furniture Car Rally & Sunset Cruise in the world! The Rally will bring the community of furniture car creators, drivers, advocates, and fans together for the 9th year running, to do what we do best: comfortably go really slowly. The outcome: a whimsical furniture parade that roams the city streets.
Link: http://mobilesofa.com

properties.name: The Love Beets
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:45 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Love happens in all kinds of ways, but we've found that on the playa, it happens especially when you find yourself sitting at a table with a random stranger sharing a meal you didn't even know you wanted! Our plan is to create incredible meals from the strange and wonderful *gifts* donated to us by those who happen by. Bring us whatever it is you have to "share" and we'll make you a meal fit for a king. We don't believe in waste, so nothing is ever refused, but it is truly amazing what can be created from the pile of seemingly nonsensical items that find their way to our table. What's more is what LOVE BUBBLES literally bubble up and start popping as people gather together in our tent, the conversation starts flowing, friendships are formed over a shared meal and before we all know it the sunrise is peaking over the mountains because we've all shared all the wine and the pots just kept getting filled and the love never stopped flowing.

To participate, you just have to have an open heart and hopefully *something* to contribute to our gathering. It might be a song, it may be a poem, you may just want to take a turn stirring the pot. Or maybe you wish to up the ante and ask us to somehow incorporate all that dusty granola in the bottom of your pockets? We're up for it. We're magicians... making magic out of dust.

We provide a chance to participate just by being you. We also provide a chance to participate by joining our table and sharing who you are with everyone else who is present. This is not about just standing in a line and receiving something and going on your merry way. The Love Beets love kitchen is all about lovingly allowing you to co-create with us a meal that continues to truly feed the very heart-beat of the playa. What you bring becomes part of that and you get to participate in whatever way you're most comfortable. Also, we'll teach you about LNT, by asking that you provide your own cup and utensils and if you've not got them, you can use one of our up cycled LOVE BEET bliss cup combos and even take it along with you (we hope you'll even come back) and remember to use it all along the playa. Our camp runs on mostly solar power and is a throw-back to early Burning Man days where we all shared a little bit of everything we had to make it all happen. We are going to ask that if you show up, you share a little bit of YOU. Whatever that might be to help make it all happen. It's magic as it unfolds, in the dust. Real love and magic. And it really does happen. Everyone is included, everything is impermanent, everything is just as it should be. We'll all look in our mirrors and ask, ""What do we see?"" and contemplate the answers while sharing lots of love and beets.

Link:

properties.name: The Lost Hotel
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:00 & Geek, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Lost Hotel is not your typical hotel but a "participatory hotel theatre". Each room is a stage where our "inhabitants" transport the public on an unforgettable journey from cube to cube. Examples of past cube themes are: the sound healing cube, the tooth bling cube, the silk screening cube, the message cube, the crystal healing cube, and even a jewelry making cube… just to name a few. Everything about the hotel stage is designed to surround the people with new discoveries and immersive experiences.

And, just like a conventional hotel we too have a front desk, a lobby bar, and even roof top dinning. However, we consider these areas as the front door to the “interior experience” of the hotel. Our goal is to gently pull people into the hotel so they get "lost" exploring each cube environment and interacting with all the "hotel" inhabitants.

Hence, The Lost Hotel.
Events: Our Lobby bar is open every day from noon to sunset. We have a raffle for three lucky couples to dine with us on our roof top.  
Link: http://www.thelosthotel.com



https://youtube.com/watch?v=IU_o9IeHymk

properties.name: Street Life
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 8:15 & Ballyhoo, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Street Life:Childhood Meets Playa
Picture Big Bird swigging a 40 while Barkley and the Martians dance to whatever music was on the radio during the decades of your childhood. From Public Enemy to Madonna, Beastie Boys to Beyonce, enjoy music that runs the gamut of genres while still making you nostalgic each time you recognize those first few notes of that song you used to love. When you take a break to catch your breath, enjoy some snacks and grown-folks lemonade, play a few games, and raid our craft stash to decorate yourself like your favorite character. Come dance your way down memory lane with us, as we combine the nostalgia we feel for Sesame Street with the swag, bounce, and flavor of the music we love.

properties.name: Temple of Fluff
properties.description:
Village: Fandango!
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:00 & Kook, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Temple of Fluff is a space designed to be as comfortable as feasibly possible. An individual entering Temple passes through a shaded entrance for shoe removal (Shoelution provided for storage) and into a dome, 24 feet across, filled wall to wall with comfortable things to lay on. Pillows, beanbags, and cushions cover the floor, with couches on the perimeter, facing in. For the night, there are ample blankets and chill party lights overhead. In the back, a modest sound system to provide Temple’s inhabitants with music, should it somehow not be coming from elsewhere. The custom made dome cover can be raised so that those who are lounging may interact with those who are on the street, or it may be lowered to protect against dust and wind. We hope to provide a space where people can relax and be comfortable together, within the Fluff. We wish to create an environment in which, if you see interesting people on the other side of the Fluff, you never have to stop being comfortable as you roll your way over to them. Temple of Fluff will be open all week at Burning Man to anyone who wants to lay down for a while.
Events:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/TempleofFluff?fref=ts

properties.name: Dragon Smelter
properties.description:
Village: 4:30 Plaza
Sector: 4.5
Address:
Location: 4:30 & Arcade, Black Rock City, NV
Description: The Dragon Smelter was first created in 2000 as a way to demonstrate that recycling aluminum cans generated during and at the BM event by participants could be immediately recycled into fine art sculptural wall pieces.

Our coin gifting has been hugely successful. For the last five years daily during the BM event, we’ve worked in the sun and the dust along with large numbers of participants to explore and redefine notions of value together by to melting, pressing and recycling aluminum into coins which many participants then demanded that we help them turn into wearable pendants. In the spirit of BM we, naturally, acquiesced, set up a drill press and safety trained everyone who wanted to how to use it to drill a hole in the coin to hang iit from. There are now many more pendants made from our coin designs than pure coins!!
This coin pendant gifting reflects our deep belief in Burning Man values and that Black Rock City is a place where trade, barter and gifting are the rule, and money transactions are the exception,Our yearly coins may still be a medium of exchange, but their real value is to the beholder based upon their actual actions and interactions with other BM participant and the environment of BRC. We seek in our coin/pendant designs to depict these Burning Man values that to create a coin/pendant is about the beauty of the object, and the ideas of recycling, LNT and gifting actions action of the holder.

Finally, our goal is to teach and demystify metal arts by involving old and young volunteers in the making of the coins and the other larger casted metal sculptures out of recycled aluminum. Durning these events we will also teach safety practices and create an environment that is much like a metal workshop in any studio........except the costumes will be cooler !

Day or Night.Come one Come all to the Dragon Smelter !!!!

LOCATION: 4:30 PLAZA CENTER AT 1:30
Events: PRESS YOUR VERY OWN BURNING MAN COIN !!!!!!!
DAILY AUGUST 31 THRU SEPTEMBER 7TH 11AM -6PM

FIRE EFFECTS NIGHTLY Aug 31 thru Sept 7
STARTS AT DUSK
LASTS UNTIL HER BREATH RUNS OUT

SAND CASTING WORKSHOP- Wednesday September !st
STARTS AT 11AM

LARGE CASTING EVENT- Thursday September 2nd
STARTS AT 5PM

ALL EVENTS LOCATED AT THE DRAGON SMELTER
IN THE CENTER OF THE 4:30 PLAZA AT 1:30

properties.name: The Boardroom aka Driven By Profit
properties.description:
Village:
Sector: 9
Address:
Location: 9:15 & Laughing Sal, Black Rock City, NV
Description: Our ""Mobile Boardroom System"" is again going to grace The Playa this 2015 with efficiency and management expertise! Help bring professionalism to The Burn!

Driven by Profit's Mobile Boardroom System brings business acumen in a professional package to the many opportunities waiting to be seized in Black Rock City. Had enough whimsical revelry to last you a lifetime? Sick of pirate ships, giant dragonflies, fuzzy slippers and weird robots getting in the way of doing work while at Burning Man? Our simple method of cutting through excess overhead provides a Black Rock City experience that promises "just-in-time" delivery for all seven days of your playa work week! Come on in for an interview to see if you're eligible to join our exciting team!

Black Rock City in Gerlach, Nevada

The Last Resort - 10 & L

Monday, August 31 at 8:00am
Black Rock City in Gerlach, Nevada

properties.name: Rootist Yoga
properties.description:
Village: Sun Guardians
Sector: 7.5
Address:
Location: 7:00 & Donniker, Black Rock City, NV
Description: "What is #Rootism?" My response to this in short: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs. These truths are different for everyone based on how they were raised and what we resonate with at the time of our learning. As a #Rootist, we take the roots of various truths and incorporate them into our own mantra, our own way of living, to become the well rounded person that we wish to be. When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
Events: https://www.facebook.com/events/1064111576949002/

When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
